name: Retro
description: Retro is an arcade-style mini game collection with an arcade, story mode and a "corrupted" arcade! Play though the mini games in arcade mode, battle the virus in story mode or try for a new high score with much more challenging games in the corrupted arcade!

name: Carrier Battles WW2: Admiral of the Fleet
description: A real-time WW2 naval warfare simulation game on tactical level, Admiral of Fleet features 20 scenarios covering the naval battles between carriers in the early stage of the war, from December 1941 to the end of 1942.

name: Signal
description: A game in the genre of horror that tells you the story of the main character named John who works on the space station Atlant. You will find a leisurely gameplay with elements of small puzzles and story narration through the onboard crew records. Welcome to the space station Atlant!

name: Destructo
description: Destruction sandbox with different game modes, dynamic building destruction and character customization.

name: Dots!
description: Dots! An exciting game built on an easy and relaxed gaming experience. You just need to relax and enjoy the gameplay for many hours.

name: Race for the Galaxy: Brink of War
description: As conflicts spread, galactic prestige becomes all-important, both to extract concessions and to fend off attackers. Meanwhile, the Alien departure point is located and the Uplift Overseers arise. Can you build the most prosperous and powerful space empire in a galaxy on the brink of total war?

name: Delve Deeper: Treasures and Tunnels
description: "Treasures and Tunnels," Delve Deeper's first DLC expansion, brings you 50% more Delve Deeper maps and 25% more treasure. For those counting, that's 10 new levels and 25 brand new relics. Each level is custom-tailored to be tackled by different team combinations, and each relic custom-designed to add new excitement to every map!

name: Electronic Super Joy 2: Groove Wizard's Tower
description: Has the Groove Wizard returned? MAYBE HE'S AFTER YOUR BUTT!??? DLC includes: A new world to conquer! 15 amazing new levels! New music! 3 new achievements! Ride the sky whale! Less sexy butts. MORE SEXY BUTTS. ELECTRONIC RAINBOW GLAMOUR BOSS FIGHT!

name: Block Smash
description: Choose your powerup, ball, and paddle and face off against a variety of blocks in this game inspired by Breakout!

name: The Lost Valley
description: Lightning killed your plane near an unknown continent.

name: Germany at War: Soviet Dawn
description: Germany At War: Soviet Dawn is a turn-based operational wargame, with a strong historical focus. You command either the German forces through a branching historical campaign covering the entire 1941 campaign as well as part of the 1942 one or the Soviets from 1941 to the revenge of 1944/45.

name: Peg Solitaire
description: A relaxing, yet challenging peg jumping board game.

name: Hungry Dino
description: Have you ever realized that you are ready to eat a horse? Help the little dinosaur to eat with various tasty treats, and do not become a delicacy yourself.

name: Easy Quiz
description: An Easy Quiz to test your skills.

name: Cloudbuilt: Defiance
description: Five new levels set in a variety of unique and deadly themes, along with a new game mode to boot. You must have the base game Cloudbuilt on Steam in order to play.

name: Top Secret
description: Sin descripción

name: Age of Barbarian Extended Cut: The Slaves' Fortress
description: The slaves' fortress stands on a rugged spur of rock, apparently unattainable. Here lives a notorious slave's master named Gurgo, who decides on the fate of men brought here from all over to be bought or sold.

name: Across the Galaxy: Stellar Dominator
description: In the game, You can assist your friends in occupying resource-rich strongholds, attack other camps,prevent friendly strongholds from being invaded,assist your friendly camps in developing technology. At the same time, continue to strengthen your own technology by developing more powerful spaceships

name: Vertigo
description: Sin descripción

name: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Frenzy
description: In Full Metal Frenzy the racing mayhem that is Gas Guzzlers Extreme continues with new maps, new cars and new power-ups not to be missed!

name: Rising Sun
description: 2D roguelite action. Exhilarating action with easy controls. Grab the relics and use your skills to conquer the tower as many times as you can. Even the toughest bosses will be easy depending on your luck!

name: House of Velez: Part 2
description: The continuation- and the end to House of Velez. Re-enter the house and uncover the full story behind this bloody nightmare. A whole new cast of otherworldly monstrosities, and sadistic puzzles, await to pull the flesh from your bones. Travel carefully and you may yet survive this unholy trial.

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 3
description: Extend your gaming experience with 10 new levels contained in this new DLC. The INCEPTION series is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. The levels from the original Hacker Evolution Untold game have been remastered for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine.

name: RoguekiniZ
description: A rogue-like looter-shooter, with bikinis and zombies, and zombies in bikinis. Level up, loot up, look good, kill good.

name: Battle Cube
description: Battle Cube - is a 2D platformer with surviving elements and unusual bonus system. Having them, a player gets unique abilities to prevent all obstacles on the way.

name: Pripyat-3
description: "Pripyat-3" is an endless Match-3 game for all fans of this genre. Collect rows of supplies, use bonuses, clear the playing field and remember that time is against you!

name: Hate Free Heroes: Agents of Aggro City
description: Hate Free Heroes is a modern day role playing game that takes the player into the role of an H.F.H agent and researcher dedicated to decreasing the rise of "Aggromites" in the city.

name: MahJong: Medieval Fantasy
description: MahJong: Medieval Fantasy is the perfect game for the casual player looking for fun and extensive gameplay. The goal of this game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board. The game is finished when all pairs of tiles have been removed from the board.

name: Streamline
description: Streamline is a very early build of the FPS being developed by Watson Digital. Featuring many game modes such as Capture the Flag, and Team Deathmatch.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation - Lily-ad Dungeon
description: The Lily-ad Dungeon DLC allow players to explore Lily Rank specific dungeons and raise their Lily Ranks at a faster rate!

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 5
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: The Game of Life 2: Frozen Lands World
description: Explore in The Game of Life 2. Put on your warmest coat and snow boots, it's time to join your friends and family for magic that will never melt away, in the Frozen Lands world!

name: Love: Interactive Therapy
description: Love: Interactive Therapy is a relationship application for married couples looking to stimulate love, affection, romance and intimacy in their relationship. Build a stronger more intimate bond with your partner and improve your relationship and love life.

name: Frontrunners
description: Frontrunners is a blend of tactical shooter and survival horror. Work alone or with your friends to move tactically through a range of levels to complete paid contracts. Money means more guns and equipment. Fight against a horrific range of enemy entities that will hunt you relentlessly.

name: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Zombie
description: A Zombie apocalypse has taken over the hi-octane GAS GUZZLERS EXTREME universe ! Normally this would be bad news for humanity, but not for you ! Armed to the teeth in your rig, and with insane power-ups littering each arena, you should be more than capable of obliterating the hordes of the undead.

name: Circle Empires Rivals: Forces of Nature
description: Nature has had enough and joins the battle in Circle Empires Rivals: Forces of Nature, a DLC for the fast-paced multiplayer RTS game Circle Empires Rivals! Command new leaders and units, explore the lore book and transform circle biomes in the brand new game mode: 'Terraform'!

name: Aurora
description: This is a light puzzle game of pretty girls, so help the girls solve their problems! Then you can interact with the pretty girls.

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 4
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.

name: Death Palette
description: This game traps you in a gloomy studio for seven days, where you must contend with a cursed painting of a girl and use your wits to survive.

name: People Power: The Game of Civil Resistance
description:
People Power is about politics, about strategy and about social change. As a leader of a popular movement you will fight against tough adversaries who control the police, the army, the bureaucracy—even the media. The only weapon in your hand is your strategic skill and ingenuity.

But People Power is more than just a game. It’s an opportunity to join a community of others who want to learn about civil resistance and nonviolent strategies. The game allows you to design and play your own custom scenarios by using a Scenario Builder. Everyone can design scenarios and post them on the People Power forum, available to the whole community, where you can exchange ideas with other players and scenario writers.

name: Pizza Nostra
description: Chicago 1930, Joe Matone a petty thief, is caught by the police in a confusing episode. A desperate police officer with a serious problem offers him freedom if Matone fulfils the tough mission to infiltrate the dangerous Muzzarelli Family, in order to save his kidnapped daughter. Therefore, Joe will get involved in a great adventure, with many plot twists, difficult decisions, lies, betrayals and violence. Featuring: Over 100 rooms Tons of characters Minigames Music from the 30â€™s Steal! Kill! Blackmail! Earn your freedom!

name: Prince of Destruction
description: Prince of Destruction is a shareware role playing game for either a single player on their own PC or up to four players over a local network for which the game uses M.A.R.S (the Multiplayer Animated Role-Playing System).

name: Island of Winds
description:
Island of Winds takes you to 17th century Iceland, plunging them into a magical world teeming with trolls, giant spiders, and mythical creatures. Experience all of this through the eyes of the magic-wielding Brynhild, a member of the Balance Keepers who draws her magical power from the natural world.

Brynhild's journey has her on a quest to find her mentor, Hrymja, that will take her through nine incredible landscapes that draw on Iceland's stunning natural beauty. These locations range from the fiery Lava of Skjól to the treacherous Jökla lagoon and gleaming Obsidian Shore. Brynhild will face legendary creatures on her journey, such as the powerful and majestic Bear King, Hafgúfa - Guardian of the Sea and the majestic elven lady Vör of the Oasis.

name: BitCraft
description: BitCraft is an upcoming Survival Crafting MMORPG which takes place in a procedurally generated sandbox world with a deep skills system and a focus on crafting, economics, cultivating, and city building. There is a single, massive, editable world for all players to interact with and to permanently change. Players can choose to work together to tame the wilderness and create impressive towns and cities. They can even build empires across continents and oceans. At these levels, BitCraft becomes a deeply social and strategic game.

name: Swordsman 3: Xie Yun Liu Chuan
description: Swordman 3: Xie Yun Liu Chuan, will be based on the JX Online game universe and has no release date set yet.

name: Professor Neely and the Death Ray of Doom
description: In the game you'll take on the role of Professor Neely a retired college professor and famed inventor who is unwittingly lured to an odd house and held against his will by a mad doctor. Your goal is to escape and stop the events that are about to take place.

name: Shaman
description: Shaman is a third-person action-adventure game where you assume the role of a young Shaman amidst a great cataclysm. Seek out the ancient secrets of your people and gain the ability to Shapeshift into the mighty Jaguar, cast fireballs and incinerate your foes, and unlock the ability to lift objects at a distance.

name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Kiken na Futari - Zengohen
description: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Kiken na Futari - Zengohen is the Virtual Console port of Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Kiken na Futari, which allows the game to be played with both episodes in a single game file, as the original game was separated in two disks (Zenpen and Kouhen)

name: Mannequin House
description:
You wake up in your room and then go downstair, oddly almost all the doors are locked. You decide to go back to your room but suddenly your room turns into a hallway with a floor lamp and a door inside it.

You open the door and realize you are stuck in a loop, but you are not stuck alone. Will you escape ?

name: Mysteries of Peak Valley: Case 1 - The Lost Sonata
description:
After receiving a mysterious phone call, psychic medium Zack Gellar travels to a large estate house in northern Peak Valley, where he is greeted by a desperate woman's pleas for help. Seeing that the woman is on the brink, he agrees to help her, vowing to communicate with the spirit that haunts her, and in turn help it to find eternal peace.

----

Mysteries of Peak Valley centers around Zack Gellar, psychic medium. Zack gained his ability to speak to the dead after an automobile accident that made him an orphan. After mastering in psychology during his formative years at university, he decided to make a living by communicating with the spirits that haunt his clients and, in turn, help the souls left forever to wander the mortal realm find their eternal peace.

name: Mysteries of Peak Valley: Case 2 - The White Lady
description:
It’s been a year since the Boulyn incident and a prestigious case lures Zack back to Peak Valley. Arriving at Burnom Manor, famous for being allegedly haunted by a woman dressed all in white, Zack must use his psychic medium talents to finally unravel the legend of the White Lady.

----

Mysteries of Peak Valley centers around Zack Gellar, psychic medium. Zack gained his ability to speak to the dead after an automobile accident that made him an orphan. After mastering in psychology during his formative years at university, he decided to make a living by communicating with the spirits that haunt his clients and, in turn, help the souls left forever to wander the mortal realm find their eternal peace.

name: Mysteries of Peak Valley: Case 3 - The Ruin of Souls
description:
A hotshot investigative journalist finds himself embroiled in a homicide case. A controversial psychic medium awakens in a strange location suffering from memory loss. Mysteries of Peak Valley 3: The Ruin of Souls takes the player on a grueling journey through a nefarious conspiracy and tangled webs of illusion where secrets are revealed, mysteries are unraveled and truths shall be questioned. Is this the end or merely the beginning?

Sunny Penguin Games presents the free-to-play third instalment of the supernatural ghost drama series, Mysteries of Peak Valley, blending time-honored point-and-click adventure gaming with modern expectations and visual novel elements.

----

Mysteries of Peak Valley centers around Zack Gellar, psychic medium. Zack gained his ability to speak to the dead after an automobile accident that made him an orphan. After mastering in psychology during his formative years at university, he decided to make a living by communicating with the spirits that haunt his clients and, in turn, help the souls left forever to wander the mortal realm find their eternal peace.

name: Quick Majik Adventure
description: Ostensibly the shareware version of a more robust, non-quick Majik Adventure, as with their later Dragon Hunt this is a bit of a graphical roguelike, placing a fantasy adventurer smack in the middle of level 75 of a series of random and devious dungeons, filled to the gills with treasures and hostile creatures. As an earlier effort Neurosport hadn't yet extruded the perspective into three bewildering dimensions here, and so we still retain the traditional top-down view, prettied up (and range-of-view constrained) with a graphical tile set.

name: RAM Ghost
description: Originally made and sold as part of the AGS Bake Sale in 2012, RAM Ghost is now re-released in its original form as freeware! Adopt a RAM Ghost! With our self-installing Hopelessly Old-fashioned, User-Supported Environment (H.O.U.S.E.), you can lure a bit of abandoned game code into a simulated house. Just like you and me, these ghosts love fun and entertainment, and it's up to you to take care of your little guest. Who knows... maybe you can even make it into the game it was once supposed to be?

name: Realm of the Paladin: Deception's Plague
description: Realm of the Paladin is an old school top-down rpg.

name: Rein
description: rein, to constrain or be guided by constraint, is a game about survival, escape and medical research! (mostly survival).

name: Crossfire: The Multiplayer Adventure Game
description: Crossfire is an open source, cooperative multiplayer graphical RPG and adventure game. Since its initial release, Crossfire has grown to encompass over 150 monsters, about 3000 maps to explore, an elaborate magic system, 13 races, 15 character classes, a system of skills, and many artifacts and treasures. Crossfire is based in a medieval fantasy world and is similar to other games of this genre.

name: Robo Quest
description: Robot crashes on an unknown planet, he must repair his "home" to continue the journey, and to get to a party in time!

name: Robotragedy
description: My game is called ROBOTRAGEDY, and is the story of a little robot who can't go to the living room to see the show of Robotinna, a robotic singer our little buddy loves. Once he gets to the living room he sees on the TV that Robotinna has been kidnapped and then he goes out to rescue her.

name: Alwa's Collection
description: Alwa's Collection includes Alwa's Legacy and Alwa's Awakening for the Nintendo Switch on one physical cartridge.

name: Robotragedy 2: Countdown to Doomsday
description: Join Toby X in his new adventure and help him battle the ultimate villain, Nazgu Bain, before the Universe is gone as he know it. Travel around space and even time to recover some legendary and long lost pieces of a mysterious amulet, and save the day and his precious wife.

name: Rockabilly Kid
description: Billy can't hang with the old dudes because, apparently, he's not enough rockabilly. Well, he's going to prove them WRONG! (An entry to MAGS May 2009)

name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Aoi Tsukiyo no Mahou no Ko - Game de Asobou! Eiga no Sekai
description:
Let's get excited with the 20 kinds of party mini-games base on movie episodes with family and friends!

This game is comical and strange base on movie episodes that contain 20 types of mini-games. All mini-games are compatible with a single Joy-Con and can play up to four players competitively or cooperatively.

Collect jigsaw puzzle pieces to complete the scene from the movie.

By playing the mini-games, you will receive puzzle pieces as a reward and can be placed into the jigsaw puzzle. When one jigsaw puzzle is complete, a scene from the movie will show.

Furthermore, you can repeat the completed jigsaw puzzle as many times as you like. The time it takes to complete is recorded, so you can break the record in the shortest time as you can.

New characters from the movie will appear.

Not only the familiar characters will appear, but also the new mages from the movie will appear in the game.

name: Rob Blanc I: Better Days of a Defender of the Universe
description: A chip shop worker from England has been selected from millions of bored but adventurous people to become an intergalactic hero.

name: Rob Blanc II: Planet of the Pasteurised Pestilence
description: Rob is ready to take his new ship and begin his crusade. However, the High Ones insist he take a short holiday on Earth for a month, just to say goodbye. Not because they care for his feelings, but because they haven't actually built the ship yet.

name: Rob Blanc III: The Temporal Terrorists
description: Something sinister is going on in the universe. Strange sightings have been reported; it seems that clones of ships, people and even planets have been appearing; clones that apparently echo both the future and the past. The governments of the universe have all drawn a blank - so they pass the buck onto Rob Blanc. Control both him and his sidekick Paul as you get to the bottom of the problem, visit four different interstellar locations and travel to a parallel universe...

name: Rome Pathway to Power
description: Rome: Pathway to Power is set - as the name implies - in Ancient Rome. You start life as a poor slave in Herculaneum, which, along with Pompeii, was destroyed by the eruption of Mt. Vesuvius. Eventually you travel to Rome and climb the social ladder, becoming a Captain in the army, a Senator and eventually Emperor of Rome. Four of the game's six levels are adventure style romps, while in the other two levels you control an army in an attempt to conquer an enemy of Rome. The game contains many characteristic details to be seen around the levels; from naked people running around the Baths, to buying slaves to fight in the Gladiatorial games. There are instances in which you have the freedom to choose how to deal with various problems.

name: City of Cards
description: City of Cards takes the best aspects of City Builders and Deckbuilding Card Games, then fuses it into something completely new and innovative. Build cities, watch them thrive, respond to various exciting events, assemble your own custom deck and create your City of Cards!

name: Salt
description: Salt is a traditional, albeit small, point-and-click adventure about the aftermath of a shipwreck in the Antarctic, loosely based on the doomed Franklin expedition.

name: Saturday School
description: Vivi finds out that her friends are going to the beach the same morning that she is in Saturday school detention. Will she escape? Can she get out before it's too late? Originally created for the first-ever "One Room, One Week" Competition, April 2005. The game was also nominated for Best Short Game in the AGS Awards 2005.

name: Scenario 5B
description: Tied to a bed and slowly losing control over your body? A small sci-fi adventure for the February 2015 MAGS competition "Losing Something"

name: Feline
description: Feline is a GameBoy Advance game which is made using Butano. This game was made for GBA Jam 2021 of itch.io.

name: Grottonnia
description: A collection of minigames that engage and utilize your 3D play space in fun and unique ways.

name: Heroes of Legionwood: Episode 2
description: Saved from the brink of oblivion, you must search for answers amongst a civil war that is tearing Port Alexis apart. It is up to you to pick a side and determine the ultimate fate of Port Alexis and discover the origins of the Darkness.

name: Heroes of Legionwood: Episode 3
description: Heroes of Legionwood: End of Days is the riveting final chapter of the Heroes of Legionwood saga.

name: Space Fox Kimi: The Battle of Mochi Prime
description: A stroke of luck, a once in a lifetime chance to end the war. The fleet gathers in preparation for an invasion. The Battle of Mochi Prime... is about to begin.

name: Jetpack Astronaut
description: Jetpack Astronaut - 2D indie game with arcade elements, made in stylized graphics.

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Hacker Bootcamp
description: Welcome to the Hacker Bootcamp. This learning mission will be an opportunity for you to prove yourself as a competent tech hacker and learn the features and gameplay of Hacker Evolution Duality. You will find various files in this level that give excerpts from the Hacker Evolution Duality game manual.

name: Refuge For Troubles: Episode 1 - Dear Stranger
description: No more word: just the story of how the lobotomy was defeated by the forces of strong male friendship.

name: Shape Shift Shawn: Episode 1 - Tale of the Transmogrified
description:
Help Shawn to survive the underworld by transforming into powerful new forms and mastering a gauntlet of bizarre platforming challenges!

Shape Shift Shawn is a brand-new, episodic sidescrolling saga, styled with retro pre-rendered art that evokes the early 3D sidescrollers of the 90s, backed by a funky soundtrack (featuring veteran drummer G. Calvin Weston!) Each episode has 18 challenging levels and four dastardly bosses for Shawn to take down – a challenge worthy of any platforming veteran!

name: Robot Labs: Remake
description: You wake up in a robot body and a charismatic voice makes you take endurance tests. You take your device to move objects in space and show this voice how to pass these tests.

name: Rainbows, Toilets & Unicorns: Outraged & offended
description: Fight for your right in the Outraged & offended DLC

name: Ball at Work: The Ultimate Speedrun Platformer!
description: Experience the thrill of the high-flying antics of the Crazy Ball as it bounces around the dysfunctional office. With unique and challenging gameplay that is easy to grasp, outrageous physics and plenty of fun content, this is one wacky office that you’d never want to leave!

name: Eastern Tactics
description: Eastern Tactics is a classical Turn-base Tactic RPG (SRPG). Players need to train their team through battles, manipulate the character pieces to move, give orders correctly, selectively upgrade their characters with reasonable equipment and use skills to pass one level challenge after another.

name: Expiration
description: In the valley near Kohen City, there’s a small town called Tucker Vale. After receiving strange signals from the mountains, all communications with Tucker Vale vanish. A team of Special Forces has been sent on a mission to check on the village and find out what happened.

name: Amazed
description: Amazed is an atmospheric first-person exploration adventure game with elements of action and horror. Lost in a labyrinth, prey to others. Find as many items and clues to escape it and enjoy escalating difficulty in both exploration and action aspects of the game.

name: Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - The Age of Turbulence
description: In the last years of the Han Dynasty, the empire was plunged into long-term chaos and turmoil. The warlords fought with each other; bandits run rampant; foreign races disturbed the frontiers; ancient beasts seem to be coming to the world soon...

name: Dissection Simulator: Dogfish Edition
description: VictoryXR’s virtual shark dissection software is a hands-on opportunity experienced through the power of VR. Join Wendy Martin, national award-winning science teacher, to guide you through a virtual reality shark dissection.

name: Descent: Road to Legend - Trials of Frostgate
description: The Trials of Frostgate are not for the faint of heart. Only the bravest shall be named Champion.Trials of Frostgate transports 2-4 heroes to the Free City of Frostgate, where the Northern Tribes have gathered for feasting, dancing, and sacred rituals, including the famed trials.

name: Paper Shakespeare: Very Naked Hamlet
description: So, like, either know Shakespeare's Hamlet, or don't get laid. That's it. That's the game.

name: Alien X
description: Alien X - is a hardcore game where you will have to survive playing like a monster Bomber who is on an unknown planet.

name: Sex Office Story
description: Sex Office story presents the idea of a perfect job. You alone at work full of hot horny women.

name: Miscreated: Canyonlands
description: Miscreated: Canyonlands DLC is a completely brand-new map for Miscreated, developed from the ground up to utilize a vastly new environment based in a fictional Navajo desert. Survive and explore in a post-apocalyptic open world with up to 50 players on a server.

name: Army Gals: The Poker Game
description: Can you beat the three girls at five card strip poker and reveal the gals a little more intimately.

name: Groove Catcher
description: Groove Catcher is a rhythm-and-dance game that grooves and flows. We've got smooth moves, tight rhythms and beauty. Feeling chill? Feeling energized? We've got all moods covered, or load your own songs. Build your own levels right in the game just by dancing and share them with the world!

name: Flow
description: Flow is a psychological horror adventure video game. Wake up in the shoes of Flo, a 19-year-old, and embark on an adventure into a strange and wonderful world. The more you investigate, the more you can learn about the truth behind the universe.

name: Hundred Chances
description: Challenging 2D Platformer - The Game will test your strength and abiliity ! Can you make your way to the top ?

name: Door 2: Key - Path to Heaven
description: Return to an unforgettable adventure with the DLC Door2: Key - Path to heaven. You have to visit 2 new worlds in the simulation and solve a bunch of new puzzles.

name: Scary Tales
description: Scary Tales is a tactical first-person action arena set in a mystical setting of Slavic folk tales. The story tells about a young priest from a special squad who fights against various evil spirits that exist in our world.

name: The Lost Artifacts
description: Explore dungeons, find crafting materials, unlock new locations and battle monsters in this turn based rpg game!

name: Space Fox Kimi and the Interstellar Fortress
description: Kimi and her crewmates on board the GFE Agedashi comes across a strange installation built on top of a large asteroid... What could be waiting for them inside the Interstellar Fortress?

name: Magna Fortuna
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. One night while trying to sleep, Ayana Tomori is awoken by the sound of thunder and a brilliant light envelops her. When her sight returns, she finds herself in a strange new world.

name: The Game of Life 2: Age of Giants World
description: Step into The Game of Life 2: Age of Giants world! Experience a land where pegs and dinosaurs are the best of friends! From Coastal Caves, through the Jurassic Jungle, all the way to Stone Town, it's the journey of your prehistoric life!

name: The Game of Life 2: Sandy Shores World
description: Dive into The Game of Life 2: Sandy Shores world! Watch the difficult decisions melt away on this forever holiday in the land of sunshine! Ride the waves as a Surf Instructor, or swim beneath them as a Marine Biologist. It's a life-long escape and the choices are all yours!

name: Defender of the Turrets: Warp Attack
description: Defender of the Turrets : Warp Attack is an Arcade Shooter where you can buy different Towers and upgrade them to destroy Waves of incoming Enemies.

name: Fallen
description: Finish what had already begun, halt the Darkness in its tracks, and shape a brighter future for the entire world. Prove yourself worthy as a warrior, as you take on what no faint heart could fathom.

name: Birthright Cataclysm: Overture
description: A shamelessly difficult and strange RPG aimed at speed runners and masochists, or anyone who enjoys a bizarre and deep story. Birthright Cataclysm - Overture marks the beginning of a new series by Hisoka.

name: Jewels of the Mysterious Woodland: Fairies Magical Jewel Match Quest
description: Fairies Magical Jewel Match Quest - The new match 3 game is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles! A magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

name: Hymeno Striker: Akashicverse Minigame
description: This is a horizontal scrolling shmups featuring Hymeno, the boss character of "Akashicverse: Malicious Wake". There are three stages with three difficulty levels. At first glance, the game looks poppy and easy to play, but it's really "Akashicverse" inside.

name: Annoying Ball Game
description: In the Annoying Ball Game you play as a ball. As the ball you go through the obstacle course trying to reach the end. There are 3 endings, it's up to you to find them.

name: Aphelion
description: Jump into a commander chair and strap in. Explore a vast and changing universe as a Federation combat pilot. Fight your enemies and expand the influence of the Federation across different regions and constellations. Gather resources and research technologies to aid you on a conquest of the frontier.

name: Gravity Kid
description: A rabbit on a rocket that can change gravity!

name: Lost In Time
description: This is a First Person Story Adventure video game with Walking Simulator mechanics. The main character can interact with different objects and can add it to her inventory. Collect letters, explore areas and enjoy the scenery. Solve the mystery and find the truth.

name: Family
description: An exploration-based horror game.

name: CyberPunk Sex Tower
description: The world of the future, modern technologies make it possible to create a super realistic sexual experience ...

name: Farm Manager 2021: Brewing & Winemaking
description: Start producing beer and wine in Farm Manager 2021 Brewing and Winemaking package. Get the fields ready for hops and grapevines, harvest the crops and prepare a perfect recipe to produce your own type of the most appreciated spirit in the world.

name: Rainbows, Toilets & Unicorns: Entertainment Corp.
description: Defeat the evil corporation in the Entertainment Corp. DLC

name: The Game of Life 2: Fairytale Kingdom World
description: There are more worlds to explore in THE GAME OF LIFE 2. Join your friends and family in a mystical adventure through the Fairytale Kingdom world, where dreams come true!

name: Iterria Zone
description: Iterria Zone - Horde destroying game. First-person Shooter, Survival, Horror

name: The Seven Years War (1756-1763): Pomeranian War
description: The Seven Years War (1756-1763) - Pomeranian WarONCE A GREAT NORTHERN EMPIRE, NOW DEGRADED. A FLEETING MOMENT IN HISTORY. A CHANCE TO RESTORE WHAT WAS LOST?- new playable nation: Sweden- 5 new campaign scenarios for Sweden, where you may attempt to lead the nation from 1750 all the way through the war, or go for historical goals in the...

name: Reboot
description: In the fall of 2050, nearly a decade after an AI crisis ended, the Bates and two others are trying to find their last hope, Ocean City. The shortage of supplies and the threat of zombies have already made things difficult for them, and the appearance of a band of bandits has added to their woes.

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall: The Scout - Act 3
description: A whimsical puzzle-adventure game set in the world of the bestselling Redwall books. In this third and final episode, seeking escape from Cheesfthief you find yourself beholden to a family of mysterious Stoats who may or may not be carnivores...

name: The Detail: Episode 3 - Devil in the Detail
description: Devil in the Detail is the third and final episode of the first season of The Detail, a neo-noir crime adventure from Rival Games. It brings the modern noir story of detective Reggie Moore, informant Joe Miller and officer Katelyn Hayes to a dramatic finale.

name: Descending: House of Nightmares
description: Descending is a VR horror game with puzzle elements. You play as the new owner of a house and your goal is to break the curse that was cast upon the estate.

name: Waifu Collector
description: Waifu Collector is a casual card-collecting gacha/loot-box simulator wrapped in a light visual novel and dating simulator framework, with nudity, sex, and full tradable and marketable Steam Inventory support! Designed to be played for a few minutes each day.

name: Kurt: Der Fussballmanager
description: Kurt: Der Fussballmanager - The perfect soccer manager for young and old. Game depth and fun guaranteed. KURT puts football back in the spotlight.

name: Field of Glory II: Medieval - Swords and Scimitars
description: Field of Glory II: Medieval - Swords and Scimitars is a turn-based tactical game set in the High Middle Ages and it's the second DLC for Field of Glory II: Medieval. Developed by the legendary Richard Bodley Scott it brings the best from the tabletop world into the best digital framework.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - Hero of the Nation
description: Fight your way to the very top of French powers! Sieges, epic sea battles and dirty colonial business affairs! Whould you like to become a General-Governor of French New World?

name: Sokoban (Boxman) Classic
description: Classic box pushing Sokoban puzzle game, with 306 mentally stimulating levels.

name: Entity
description: Secure the site against hostile Entities or take control of an Alpha Entity and fight against your human oppressors! Entity pits humanity against supernatural "Entities" in an asymmetric multiplayer first person shooter.

name: Panmorphia: Enchanted
description: A room escape game set in the magical world of Panmorphia. Wield the four elements and upgrade the amulet!

name: Delta Time
description: Δ Time (Delta Time) is a third person game which takes place in space in a lit artsy pixelated style. Time moves only when you move, so prepare yourself for a thrilling slow motion experience. Take your time and fight in style! :)

name: Snake 2 DX: Reawakening
description: Explosive, balls-to-the-wall bullet hell shooter with novel shooting mechanics (and surreal comedy)

name: House Designer
description: House Designer is a home design and construction simulator that lets you learn all the stages of construction without leaving your home. Design, build, finish, experiment, combining unusual architectural elements and enjoy your dream house.

name: Oik 5: DLC
description: New levels and soundtrack file.

name: Border Force: Space Force
description: Border Force goes to space! Featuring a new 8 day campaign and new multiplayer map: all with no gravity!

name: Phoenix Point: Corrupted Horizons
description: A new deadly strain of the Pandoravirus appears that saps the will from every being it touches! This is a deadly threat to Phoenix, but can they make use of it against the Pandorans, as well? New enemies, a new soldier type, and new campaign missions.

name: Retro Vaders: Reloaded - Classified Projects
description: A collection of brand new content developed especially for Retro Vaders: Reloaded that expands the game even further!

name: Party Hard: High Crimes
description: 10 years after the events of Party Hard, the Party Hard Killer is struggling to control his darker side.

name: Unity of Command: Black Turn
description: This prequel DLC, whose events happen prior to "Stalingrad Campaign", completes the Eastern Front story as told by "Unity of Command". Take control of the Wehrmacht and its allies in Operation Barbarossa, from the dramatic early victories all the way to ignominious defeat at the gates of Moscow.

name: ToA: Seasons Of The Wolf - Bad Blood
description: In "Bad Blood," DLC for the base game ToA: Seasons of the Wolf, you'll find out what really happened to our heroes after they returned to Ninim.

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Inception Part 2
description: The INCEPTION series is going back to the roots of the Hacker Evolution games. The levels from the original Hacker Evolution game have been remastered for the new Hacker Evolution Duality engine. Experience an entirely different game through this DLC as you hack your way through the levels from the original Hacker Evolution game,...

name: Loren the Amazon Princess: The Castle Of N'Mar
description: Amazon scouts are missing! All clues lead to the vampire-infested Castle Of N'Mar.Find out what happened to them and try to save them from Zachary and Valery N'Mar.You'll met other bizarre characters like Mother Morte and Zeal.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Arctic Strike
description: The fight continues with Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Future Soldier Arctic Strike Map Pack, as the battle takes you from the streets of Moscow to the far reaches of the Arctic. This all-new content pack extends your Ghost Recon Future Soldier experience with new multiplayer maps, a new multiplayer mode, a new Guerrilla Mode...

name: Game of Thrones: Beyond the Wall - Blood Bound
description: Travel beyond the Wall, 10 years prior to the events of Game of Thrones! Plunge into the dark past of Mors Westford and delve deep into Wildling territory in a perilous mission… that same mission where Mors earned his nickname.

name: Rabi-Ribi: Is the order a DLC?
description: What are Ribbon's friends up to and what's the source of that mysterious aura under the island? Go high above Rabi-Ribi Ravine and deep into the Hall of Memories to find out!

name: House Flipper: Cyberpunk
description: The Cyberpunk DLC includes: - brand new apartment with unique environment, - transhumanist hand skin, - over 60 cyberpunk style items.

name: Valhalla Hills: Sand of the Damned
description: In the first DLC of the Viking adventure Valhalla Hills, our valiant heroes brave the harshness of desert survival. Scorpions and mummies are not the only challanges on the road to Valhalla, though. The earth itself will make life difficult, as it lies barren and dry without irrigation.

name: Mimpi Dreams: Factory
description:
The factory discharges poisonous gases into the atmosphere and destroys all nature that surrounds it. Everything is the work of a ruthless boss who is only interested in money.

This DLC extends Mimpi Dreams with a whole new adventure. The Factory level is larger than any other level in the free version. It features a new story, puzzles, animations and hundreds of sounds.

name: Niffelheim: Bloody Moon
description: The Bloody Moon DLC features a long night, a red moon and lots and lots of spiders and skeletons. No hens or hares, it’s just you and your dragon - let’s set everything on fire!

name: Touhou Jitsuzaisou: Dream Logical World
description: A reality-bending, strategy-oriented Touhou Project fan game. Shoot down enemies, dodge bullets and use Aspect Shifts to warp existence.

name: Future Fragments: Command Z
description: Future Fragments was developed with support from Jump Into The Light in New York City and was debuted at Cite Internationale des Arts in Paris.

name: Battle Scooter: Training Chamber
description: Experience a new kind of physics based platforming action with an electrical scooter!

name: Invader TD
description: Invader TD is a side scroller tower defense, where the player is in the role of an alien race with the purpose of infecting and dominating the earth, but for that you must protect yourself from the attacks of the humans, who are trying to destroy you.

name: In Fear I Trust: Episode 2 - The Last Desk
description: “In Fear I Trust” 2nd Episode tells us the story of Nikolay’s memories of horrific events that took place in the school. Nikolay finds a diary and a note from one of the students and recalls what strange things happened with the children, what experiments were carried out on them, which then influenced their aggressiveness. He finds a photo of the girl with whom he became friends and tries to remember what exactly happened to her, and why the school principal carried out all those experiments, and whether it is connected somehow with the VERSA company.

name: Gaslamp Cases: The Deadly Machine
description: Morgan Johnson is one of Londons finest police detectives. Help him and his partner Jack in this brand new Macht-3 game to solve a thrilling murder case.

name: Super Army of Tentacles 3: The Search for Army of Tentacles 2 - God Makes Gnome Mistakes
description: In the first of three quest packs, choose the fate of a displaced race of creature that threatens our worlds gardening supplies. Two new quests are included.

name: Copycat
description: Copycat is a narrative-driven game that explores loneliness and belonging. It follows the story of Dawn, a hell-no-to-home-brand, pampered indoor cat living her best nine lives - until she becomes the target of an elaborate plan when a jealous stray look-alike steals her place in the home.

name: Nullore: Beginning
description: There was an unexplainable accident at the mine for the extraction of unique ore. You are the only survivor! But are you really lucky? Dangerous labyrinths of production and mines await you. You will be on the brink of life and death, and to survive you need to trust the voice in your head!

name: Griddlers Ted and Pet
description: Can the handsome scientist Ted and his clever robot P.E.T. uncover the mysteries of the past? Can you?

name: Nave: SOS Mars
description: Planet Earth is under Alien attack! MARS will honor the treaty! Be Capitan V , a Marcian ACE and save the neighboor planet.

name: Morkredd: Ode
description: The Orb welcomes you to ØDE. Head to a new playground level and spend some quality time with the Orb. Face new challenges that will put your mind, body, and spirit to the test. You might even make some fun memories together along the way. There’s also skins, hats, and screen filters

name: The Great War 1918
description: TGW 1918 is a WW1 modification for Company of Heroes, focusing on the last year of the First World War. Currently it features the British Expeditionary Force and the German Empire as opposing factions; however new nations will be brought over time, such as France and Austria-Hungary.

name: Flicker
description: Flicker is a rhythmical Jump-and-avoid game. eat yellow squares(like pack-man!), and avoid other squares.

name: First
description: Explore the wastelands with your four-legged friend in FIRST. Fight for survival, gather resources, face bloodthirsty monsters and rebuild mankind!

name: 20,000 Miles Under the Sea
description: Become a fearless underwater explorer and reach the bottom of The Mariana Trench to win 20,000* real dollars!

name: Crime Stories 2: In the Shadows
description: In the second part of the thrilling Match3 game, police detective John Doyle hopes to bring down the hammer of justice upon the remaining men responsible for the murder of his family. Solve 50 thrilling Match3 levels in 5 chapters!

name: Sanatorium: Anthropocene Retreat
description: Place yourself into fantastic gardens to work your way through evolutionary transformations, starting as a non-human agent, though viral forms of life into human shape, to finally achieve the status of artificial intelligence. Set records in mini-games, fight enemies and communicate with characters.

name: DarkTimes
description: DarkTimes is a twin-stick shooter with a twist: you can shoot in multiple directions at the same time! Embody the monster huntress Anne and Friend, her mystical Raven, in a quest to find her missing son, set in an alternative, distorted version of 1880's Louisiana.

name: Trachi: Autonomy
description:
A story-driven adventure about a city and three people that shouldn't be there.
Retrace the events of a tragedy through a disjointed narrative. See whether you can make out the true intentions of a people that so desperately try to hide their true intentions.

name: Hentai Princess
description: Welcome to the world of charming princesses! This game will give you a lot of positive emotions! Solve puzzles, undress royal ladies, enjoy beautiful art and steamy animations!

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall: The Scout - Act 2
description: A whimsical puzzle-adventure game set in the world of the bestselling Redwall books. In this second episode, fresh off your defeat of the murderous Scumsnout, you wake to hear the sounds of battle - and must make your way into the fray to find your lost beloved!

name: Starship Commander: Arcade
description: From Mass Effect, Tomb Raider, and Saints Row industry veterans, comes an cinematic experience powered by a innovative language AI where you use your voice to have real conversations with SGT. Sarah Pearson, and command the XR71 — the galaxy's most advanced ship — on a top-secret mission.

name: Half Wing
description: Rita and her parents lived in the spirit family but the demons invaded the spirit family, Rita survived and embarks on the journey of seeking the truth. This is a free and refreshing RogueLike game, designed a lot of weapons, magic skills and strike action, will let you indulge in them.

name: Solicitude Wake-up
description: Immersive virtual reality horror survival game Solicitude Wake-up takes you to seemingly abandoned research facility. You wake-up in a dark operating room, laying down on operating table. You need to survive and find your way out.

name: Second Front
description: Second Front is an accessible WWII turn-based tactical game with more than 40 infantry units and 200 tanks, vehicles and guns. It has all the depth of a paper wargame and the ease of a computer simulation. Campaign, scenarios and a complete editor make it an infinite tactical sandbox experience.

name: Tatakae! Harmonia Ongakutai
description: Sin descripción

name: The Book of Bondmaids
description: A Kingdom in ruins, a Princess in chains, a Hero caught between redemption and damnation, and an ancient, worn, dusty old Book...

name: Annihilation
description: Send the rain of atom bombs upon enemy planet and try to defend your own. Annihilation is a turn based stategy game inspired by the classic pen & paper game called Battleships.

name: Attack on Titan 2: Proof of Expertise
description: A new episode "Proof of Expertise" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Destinata: Full Red Edition
description: A fast platformer and visual novel branched game with unique style art, where nothing but time will prevail. The more the game advance the better it develops.

name: Car Tehc
description: You may not know much about cars, it doesn't matter. We don't want you to unscrew thousands of screws like other games. We offer to you, a fun car repair simulation with simple mechanics.

name: Flying Flogger
description: Flying Flogger is an arcade WWII dogfight. It’s a side view fast-paced air combat game with simple controls, minimalist design and smooth animation.

name: Elijah and the Out of this World Adventure
description: A sci-fi action game that explores the great sites of Ohio!

name: Superhero Recruitment Simulator
description: Miss being in the office? Want a career in recruitment? Obsessed with superhero's? Superhero Recruitment Simulator is your opportunity for you to work within the industry as a recruiter!

name: Dark Minute: Kira's Adventure
description: Can you help Kira to find answers for her questions? Take on mysterious technology in a thrilling platformer. Meet hundreds of prepared challenges, learn a great secret and discover the terrible secrets of the past and... humanity.

name: Haunted
description: Haunted is a horror mulitplayer-game for up to 5 players. As a team you are going to discover the old asylum and it's background. But one of your team turns out to be one of the patient. Who can you trust and who will bring you on a wrong track to feign his innocence?

name: Boo Party
description: Are ghosts and monsters real? Explore a haunted mansion, find items, take photos, and prove once and for all that they are real and sexy.

name: Hot Tiles
description: Hot Tiles is a small puzzle game where you have to find the correct place for each tile judging by its color: the 'hotter' it looks, the closer it is to the required location.

name: Twisted: A Dark Fairytale
description: A dark fairy tale about the woods outside a small village and the monster that roams within them. Become Sage and play through to uncover the mystery when they're tossed away from everything they've ever known.

name: Operator8
description: An unparalleled alien invasion has overwhelmed the Mining Block Facility on the moon Triton, leaving only death and horror in its wake. You are a mercenary known as Operator8 and you alone have been called in to bring a stop to this fierce attack.

name: Desirable: Dream Hotel
description: Enjoy the classic puzzle piece swapping gameplay with high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! This new series of Desirable features a new theme with the hottest girls.

name: Cepheus Protocol Anthology
description: Experience the outbreak of the Pangu Virus from multiple perspectives across as the brave heroes of the Center for Epidemic Research and Control battle tirelessly to stop the spread of a cataclysmic alien virus that has mutated innocent people into monstrous creatures of unimaginable power

name: Polar
description: Are you a target? or not? The target mode, one of the polar game modes, brings a different perspective to survival.If you are a good player, you can survive in a minute without dying.

name: Setting Sun
description: Slice your way through the Shogun's domain to reach the top of the Daimyo's Castle, solo or co-op. Become gradually stronger by unlocking new features in town. Master the blade or die trying in this rogue-like dungeon crawler set in Edo Japan!

name: Set for the Battle
description: This game combines two game operations: real-time strategy and shooting. You're both a commander and a soldier. It is totally up to you to win the war by good tactics or superb marksmanship.

name: Attack on Titan 2: A Cornered Rat
description: A new episode "A Cornered Rat" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and as a "Scout Mission" in "Another Mode".

name: Attack on Titan 2: Discouragement and the Leaning Tower
description: A new episode "Discouragement and the Leaning Tower" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Attack on Titan 2: White Out
description: A new episode "White Out" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Attack on Titan 2: Goddess Salvation
description: A new episode "Goddess Salvation" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and as a "Scout Mission" in "Another Mode".

name: Attack on Titan 2: Skill Demonstration
description: A new episode "Skill Demonstration" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Attack on Titan 2: A Sudden Rain
description: A new episode "A Sudden Rain" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and as a "Scout Mission" in "Another Mode".

name: Attack on Titan 2: A Titan Worth a Thousand
description: A new episode "A Titan Worth a Thousand" is added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

name: Gedel Escape
description: Survival game in a space setting with resource manager elements and puzzles

name: InMaze
description: You woke up. You don't know where you are. You don't know who you are. Soon you will meet your sister dead and your amazing story begun. Go throught maze, kill monsters and solve logic puzzles.

name: Peaceful Soul
description: Peaceful Soul is a Social Life Simulation. In this game you can interact with villagers, building friendships, finding love, take part in interesting festivals.

name: DroneGlitch
description: Low-Poly FPS with randomly generated levels. Find new weapons while fighting off a variety of drones!

name: Evil Ritual
description: You woke up in a cold and scary dungeon, and you don't know how you got there. After examining the situation and finding an old lamp, you try to get out, but you meet on your way: screamers, notes and various objects. Later, you realize that you have become part of an evil ritual!

name: Portal: Revolution
description: Portal: Revolution is a fan-made mod for Portal 2, which plays before the events of Portal 2 in the dead and decaying Aperture facility. Delve into a new story with original characters, spanning over 8 hours of gameplay and featuring over 40 new challenging test chambers that make use of new mechanics.

name: Anime Collector: Evo
description: Anime Collector: EVO is an adult open-world MMORPG. Earn your status, worth and reputation by finding rare art, items and resources. Do this by completing quests, defeating monsters, finding hidden secrets and playing various mini-games.

name: Ironseed 25th Anniversary Edition
description: A sci-fi exploration game written in 1994, updated to use a modern 3D engine, and remains faithful to the original. The story is fully intact with only minor tweaks to gameplay and cosmetics. The original game is often compared to Star Control and Starflight.

name: Dissection Simulator: Frog Edition
description: Join Wendy Martin, a national award-winning science teacher, to make Ribbit-ing Discoveries in this virtual reality Frog Dissection. Learn the fundamentals of the female frog anatomy in a fully immersive virtual reality experience.

name: Blood Rage: Digital Edition - Gods of Asgard
description: Gods of Ásgard DLC brings 7 gods: Loki, Heimdall, Tyr, Odin, Frigga, Hel and Thor to the board. Two of them, randomly chosen, will be present in each game, radically changing the rule of the region they are in.

name: Aerofly RC 7: Professional Edition
description: The Aerofly RC 7 Professional Edition upgrade includes the following new features compared to the Standard Edition:Over 130 new and unique RC modelsOver 30 new sceneries from various places around the worldRecording/Playback featureHeli TrainerModels are instantly scaleableMultiplayer capability with Voice chat

name: Midnight Scenes: The Highway - Special Edition
description: Claire Barnes is about to discover what kind of horrors lurk in the darkness of a deserted road. Welcome to a dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.

name: Blood Rage: Digital Edition - Mystics of Midgard
description: Known by many names (Seiðmenn, Völva, Vísendakona, etc.) and possessed of different powers granted by their connection to the gods, these warrior-shamans will be a boon to any clan able to recruit them!

name: ChromaBeat
description: Rhythm-based matching madness! Lineup holograms of matching colors in time with the beat in this exciting and smutty science-punk puzzler!

name: Rabi-Ribi: Cocoa Mode & Before Next Adventure
description: Rabi-Ribi 3rd Anniversary! The final DLC for the dedicated Rabi-Ribi fans! Challenge new Special Bosses with new Erina and Ribbon's new costumes! Also a new playable character!

name: Savage
description: This is an adventure game in the wild.

name: Woods: David's Story
description:
The first game in the Woods series is about David’s story, based on the book with the same title.
After The Awakening struck, a huge forest at the foot of a mountain in Colorado has now become an island and it’s here we will find David, alone, trying to survive. Equipped with an ax, a guitar, and a lantern, he is trying to get back to his family but a voice is strangely guiding to the mountain.

On a long, tough journey like this one, the effects of being alone would get to anybody, but David has someone to talk to. Making his way from camp to camp trying to stay alive in order to reach his family but he unknowingly gets closer and closer to the mountain.

As you play the game, you take the ax in your hands, place the log on the tree stump, and chop it into firewood. Feed the campfire and shelter the rest to save it from the elements but be careful to not overwork yourself. Fatigue can become just as dangerous as the cold.
Do you have what it takes to survive in the woodlands? Can you survive long enough to figure out how you ended up all alone in the Woods in the first place?

name: Unplugged
description: Unplugged is an indie beat 'em up game. with very satisfying skill sets and abilities to unlock and use during combat. the gameplay includes both melee and ranged types of combat.it's up to you how to defeat your enemies and apply those techniques.

name: The Hurricane of the Varstray: Threat of Third Force
description: The Hurricane of the Varstray -Threat of 3rd Force- Studio siestA high speed SF shooting game!The story will be the day before "The Hurricane of the Varstray". An additional story of full voice. All 8 stages of play stage. New weapons "Diverion" and "Highgrabaster" added!

name: Crown Trick: Requiem of Elements
description: Venture once again into the mystical labyrinth, to uncover more treasures. Requiem of Elements is a 100% free DLC that improves upon the original Crown Trick adventure. Featuring a plethora of new weapons, relics, familiars, skills and even a whole new game-mode called Dungeons of the Deep.

name: Skyfall
description: Play an exciting 2D old-school RPG in the classic style of Valiant - Resurrection by the same developers.

name: Veterinary Clinic Simulator
description: Play as a veterinarian whose job is to save the lives of various animals. During the game, to save your patients, you will have to be observative and react quickly to various events. The fate of the animals is in your hands!

name: Blaze
description: Blaze is a 3rd person over the shoulder action adventure game where you a budding fire elemental seek to cleanse your fellow elementals from the corruption of humanity.

name: Totally Reliable Delivery Service: Cyberfunk
description: When futuristic tech meets bass pumping funk music... Cyberfunk is the future of package delivery!

name: Deus Ex Machina: Episode 1
description: Deus ex Machina is a VR room escape game where you solve puzzles in the lab of a crazy scientist. Become a member of DEM ( Deus Ex Machina ) and save the world in danger.

name: Mage Tower: Call of Zadeus
description: A single player roguelike deckbuilder adventure! Travel across a randomly-generated world, visit towns, and collect cards. Delve into dungeons, fight monsters, and wager resources on every battle. A digital sequel to the 2013 card game.

name: Conquer the Universe
description: Conquer the Universe(CTU) is a Free To Play Idle Incremental game. Build up yourself a robot army and try to conquer the universe with endless grow.

name: This Throne Is Mine: The Card Game
description: You play as King of Qin, the one ended the 500-year civil war on this land. Act like a King to manage your follower and the royal court and unite the country. Ready to defence your throne?

name: Undead Awakening
description: This is a First Person Shooter game. Where survive waves of zombies.

name: ChineseZodiac
description: The game is a first-person single-player shooting game. The lower right corner will randomly list the targets that need to be killed.The quantity of ammunition is limited and the target needs to be killed within a specified period of time.

name: Aspen: Uncanny Home
description: Aspen: Uncanny Home puts the player in a state of psychological terror. Players will find themselves in puzzling situations and search to find the hidden story.

name: Drekirökr: Dusk of the Dragon
description: A classic-inspired RPG set in a post-apocaliptic world.

name: Underground Keeper II
description: Underground Keeper II is a logical 3D puzzle game from a first person view. You will enjoy hours of entertainment in a 60 levels and 5 different environments. Levels generator included.

name: 2945VR
description: This is an unconventional VR shooting game.In the game, you can use time slots to activate bullet-time to avoid enemy attacks.And use weapons of different styles to destroy the enemy.

name: Must Reach
description: Must Reach is a platformer in which you have to play as a schoolgirl who needs help finding books that will open the way to the next level. Destroy all monsters and go around all obstacles on your way.

name: Shadow of Valhalla
description: Visceral physics-based VR combat set within an ancient realm of Viking lore and mystic powers! Discover magical runes and unlock spells while battling evil forces throughout eternity!

name: Quarantine Simulator
description: You have to stay at home in quarantine. Get out of here, unless you want to blow your brain. Are you a real pro? I got a little surprise for you!

name: Clad In Iron: Carolines 1885
description: An additional alternative historical scenario of the colonial conflict between Germany and Spain in 1885 for control of the Caroline Islands in the Pacific Ocean.

name: Natsu no Kanata: Beyond the Summer
description:
A text adventure game depicting girls traveling the world to the end.

You found an old computer which can connect to talk with strange garl you have never met.

The girl's name is Natsuno.
She said said to be traveling alone in a world collapsed by a pandemic.

But in the world, you know, there is no pandemic or social collapse.
Where is the world she is in and why are the calls connected each other?
As you talk to Natsuno and watch over her journey, you will explore the mysteries of the end of the world.

name: On the Wire
description: Sur Le Fil or On the Wire (OTW for Friends) is a game focused on the electricity / electronics, in an interactive and fun way. The Wire Guy (Prof'Fil) will give you hundreds of missions, as funny as it is interesting, helped by Kelhann , one of young Prof' student .

name: Aurelia: Special Edition
description: Aurelia is set in a fantastic medieval world full of beautiful women and exotic races. The player will take the role of a young man that inherits his grandfathers house and on a sudden twist of fate becomes entangled with a magician.

name: Cafe Simulator
description: Cafe Simulator is an cafe business simulation game. Destruc-Build-Design the best cafe in the world!

name: Playing Pride & Prejudice 1: An Austen Armoire
description: An Austen Armoire is a time-based cozy game that illuminates Volume 1 of Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen. Combining cosplay with collecting, sharing, and daily character messages, An Austen Armoire progresses over real time. Players can read the novel in easy, snack-sized sections.

name: Oblivity: Find your perfect Sensitivity
description: Oblivity is a tool for FPS players that determines the perfect, intuitive mouse sensitivity based on your mouse movement data and your preferences. In order to achieve an optimal result, Oblivity offers many scenarios and supports over 20 games and presets.

name: Kanapocalypse
description: Kanapocalypse is an educative RPG guesser game. Train your Hiragana and Katakana while raiding a city during the apocalypse. Earn money, buy new weapons and keep study/learn more Japanese alphabet.

name: Omniblast
description: Blast off through space, dodge asteroids, and beat bosses!

name: Doctor Xenophon's Laboratory
description: A sci-fi puzzle platformer game. Make your way through the abandoned laboratory solving puzzles left behind and avoiding the deadly enemies left in the halls. And of course, don’t fall into the abyss!

name: Devastation 2: Repatriation
description: Kill enemies, earn a multiplier, build score, unlock weapons, upgrade content, achievements. Battle in a revolutionized futuristic environment with 12 dynamic levels, fight bosses and waves of enemies. Equip 11 weapon types, 6 missiles types, customize classes, repair damage and unlock skins

name: Shrimp
description: Play as a Shrimp and complete a ritual that had been abandoned in a world of abstract darkness. Shrimp is a third person platformer based in a terrifying world with entities delivering a thrill you'll never forget.

name: HRO: Adventures of a Humanoid Resources Officer
description: HRO: Adventures of a Humanoid Resources Officer is a puzzle-driven visual novel set in a retro sci-fi universe. When the Endeavor stumbles into universe-shaking trouble, can you harness the power of the bureaucracy to rein in your crew’s worst impulses and survive to the next episode?

name: Fear Protocol: Codename Omega Starring Agent Jack Banger
description: It's a nice dark day in Escondido, California and special agent Jack Banger and his superior Gilbert Simpson are planning their next operation. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when strange biomonster creatures start appearing all over the city...

name: Rock Star Simulator
description: Taste the life of a famous musician, go on the live tour across the USA and have fun just like a real star - welcome to the rock and roll heaven!

name: CyberNeon
description: This game takes the classic MATCH-THREE concept for a spin. A competitive and rapid gameplay, set in a dystopian CYBERPUNK future. Match three signs to colorize the board and DOMINATE your opponent.

name: Colosseum VR
description: Come and visit the Roman Colosseum! This guided tour will take you through its rise and downfall, bring you face to face with gladiators, and allow you to experience the glory of roman architecture like never before. Welcome!

name: Tame It!
description: In Tame It! you end up stranded on a tropical island, with the many challenges ahead, as well as hot but dangerous creatures. So will it become your demise, or you could overcome all, tame the savages and even win their hearts?

name: Droplet: States of Matter
description: Change between the different states of matter in this 3D platforming adventure!

name: Kaiju Wars
description: Play out a Kaiju movie as the (hopelessly) outclassed military in this stylish 2D turn-based strategy game. Construct buildings and defend your city with cannon-fodder tanks, jets and more as the devastating kaiju grow in power with every attack.

name: Any Fish
description: Any Fish is a simple match 3 game, tap screen drag and drop the fish get high score. Made in Construct 2. Enjoy the game!The game has nice graphics and music.Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points.Forward!

name: Beku
description: Captured by a plotting king of Beku and forced to embark on a challenging quest to finalise his plans, you'll master your devastating ethereal abilities in this 2D platformer to overcome increasing waves of formidable foes. What secrets will you find along the way?

name: Spiritwish
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Island
description: Star Island is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Dead in the Tropics
description: A social multiplayer elimination game. Every night, one player is sacrificed to the island and a vote will determine who it is. Can you survive the trials of the island while also navigating the scheming of other players?

name: Industrial Firefighters
description: Industrial Firefighters is the new edition of our well-known firefighter series. With modern graphics, new soundtrack and intensive atmosphere our well-known fire department series comes to new life.

name: Rainbows, Toilets & Unicorns: Political Drama
description: Face off ruthless political leaders in the Political Drama DLC

name: Greed
description: Greed is a 3 vs 1 competitive multiplayer game. Play as the Dungeon Master and defend your treasures or join the group of three cursed Adventurers seeking to claim them for their master: the god of Greed.

name: Combat Magic: Spells and Swords
description: This is a 3D third person shooter - slasher game with RPG elements and diverse and complex combat system.

name: Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars
description: Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars is an RPG set in a world of swords and sorcery, told entirely through the medium of cards. The story follows a self proclaimed hero as they set off to slay a recently awakened dragon, presented in the manner of a tabletop RPG and playing out through narration from the gamesmaster.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Hokuto no Ken: Hokuto Shinken Denshousha no Michi
description:
Hokuto no Ken: Hokuto Shinken Denshousha no Michi is an Action game, developed and published by Spike, which was released in Japan in 2008.

Advertised as a "vital point striking" action game, the player takes control of Kenshiro and must use the DS's touch screen to strike the vital points of adversaries to defeat them. The game's graphics consists entirely of colorized panel art from the original manga. The story mode consists of 22 chapters and adapts the manga's storyline from the beginning and up to the conclusion of Raoh saga. Other game modes includes a Battleship-style Versus Mode between two players, a Quiz mini-game, and a database of characters and famous lines from the manga. Akira Kamiya and Kenji Utsumi both return to provide their voices as Kenshiro and Raoh, with Shigeru Chiba as the narrator as well.

name: Safari
description: Sin descripción

name: Ken ga Toki
description: A mobile Japanese role-playing game. Spin-off to otome game Ken ga Kimi.

name: Komrad
description: Sin descripción

name: Sheep Quest
description:
Molly the lamb has run away! Can you help shepherd Angus find her?
Meet quirky villagers, collect items kleptomanically and enjoy colorful graphics during your quest.

name: Shifter
description: Impersonate the townsfolk to get things done in this game, but first you have to learn everything about them... Shifter is an escape the town point and click adventure with a twist!

name: Shifter's Box: Outside In
description: Sally is taking a walk outside one fine day when she comes across a strange box. Curious as to who would leave such a strange box lying around, she opens it - only to find herself in a very strange place indeed. Help Sally uncover the true nature of the box and find her way home!

name: Sniper and Spotter Being Patriotic
description: A newly recruited red army soldier finds himself assigned to a new partner and the two of them soon find themselves in a series of misadventures in a war-torn soviet town...

name: Sniper and Spotter Serving the Motherland
description: Ivan and Olga, two soldiers in the red army, finds themselves tasked with preventing a small village from falling into enemy hands. Their orders are simple, destroy the bridge and poison the food and water supply before the enemy soldiers can reach the village and destroy the bridge or poison the food and water supply... Sniper and spotter serving the motherland is a standalone sequel to my previous game Sniper and spotter being patriotic.

name: Space Rangers: Episode 46 - The Devil Within
description:
You will play the part of special agent Yaz KreJonns of the Space Rangers, the organization that is called in when regular Star fleet is not enough.
This time something strange is happening on a mining planetoid. The miners has gone missing.. and then the team of soldiers sent in to find them.
In a galaxy near you, you are to boldly go where no one else dares.

name: Spaceman in Space
description: He is the Spaceman! He is in space!

name: Star Trek Newton: Part One - Anomaly
description: Crewman John Fischer is a recent graduate of Starfleet Academy assigned to the USS Newton, a Constitution-class vessel currently tasked with performing scientific surveys in Sector 004. On the completion of his first week aboard his new assignment, John begins to realize that the reality of life in Starfleet isn't all chasing hostile aliens and meeting strange cultures. In fact, it can be quite dull. No sooner does he log this gloomy summary than the ship is rattled by some unseen force that disables many of the ships systems! Isolated and unaware of what is wreaking havoc on the Newton, John must get to his duty station and help himself and his crew stabilize the ship.

name: subAtomic
description: A dysfunctional family are miniaturised in their misguided search for a holiday, thanks to the scientific minds at S.H.A.T. (Space Holidays via Accelerated Transport).

name: Submerged: LaSol
description: A short one-room escape game, which won the February 2011 MAGS by a single vote! Stan Winston, a janitor working on a luxurious man-made island resort, the LaSol, is about to have his life turned upside down, quite literally.

name: Return to Melanat
description: Return to Melanat is a King's Field fangame. Is an attempt to recreate the environments of King's Field 2 in a whole new light, while delivering an entirely new story. Like all King's Field games, its gameplay centers around exploration, methodical combat, and light puzzle solving. All seven areas of Melanat are recreated to scale using nothing but the SOM toolset and very few custom resources.

name: Sunrise Paradise
description: Getting bored of living on a campsite, a young girl sets off to find a promised city where dreams come true and everyone is blessed with eternal happiness. Will it offer a chance at a new life or a decision she'll always regret? Originally made for OROW 9.

name: Tales of Jayvin
description:
Jayvin an unlikely hero, if every there was one, stumbles into a portal and finds himself in the land of Naturnum.
Unbeknown to him, his arrival has been expected.
Evil forces, commanded by the Dark Lord, Arachemon, are wreaking havoc across the Universe.
Only Jayvin has the power to fight these forces and put an end to Arachemon's reign of terror.

name: Tarthenia
description: Debbie Johnson thought her days of adventure were over. But when an evil warlock intervenes on behalf of his cousin, Esmeralda, she is whisked away to the island of Tarthenia. A place beyond the realm of imagination; where beauty and danger go hand in hand. And in order to save not only her life, but her sister's as well, Debbie will have to use every ounce of ingenuity she possesses. Can she thwart the plans of a madman bent on revenge? Only time will tell!

name: Terror of the Vampire!
description: Featuring 8-bit graphics and MIDI music, Terror of the Vampire! takes place in the vaguely 19th century, in vaguely Eastern Europe, where a vampire menace grips the countryside! The menace of superstition and the belief that vampires exist! Join Dr. Ego Goodmind, BHD, as he does research for his newest psychology book, The Empirical Vampirical. But is he in over his incredibly big head this time?

name: 6 Day Assassin
description: The life of an assassin is not an easy one... and often not a very long one. After receiving a phone call from a distressed friend and coworker, you find yourself in a compromising situation. In order to survive, you must rely on your minimal resources, keen sense of logic, and limited number of bullets. Meow, baaaaby!

name: The Bum
description: The game tells a story of a homeless man who communicates with the world using an old sock on his right hand. He's a huge football fan and plays it a lot near his backalley. One day he gets mugged by a wandering bully and looses his precious ball in the process. Now he must pull himself together, team up with a local superhero, find a new ball and confront his oppressor again. Available in English, German & Polish

name: The Dungeons of Grimlor
description:
The Dungeons Of Grimlor is a shareware puzzle action game.

The souls of all the children of Grimlor have been captured by the dragon that lives beneath the town. Naturally, the honour of entering the evil dragon's dungeon falls to Sir Merdimek, who is the most famous dragon slayer in the town of Grimlor.
