The story places the player in the role of Sir Merdimek to whom the task of navigating the dungeon's many rooms, collecting treasure and killing monsters has fallen.

name: The Dungeons of Grimlor II
description: The Dungeons of Grimlor II is a single player, shareware, DOS dungeon game. The dungeons are labyrinthine and are full of traps to avoid, monsters to battle and puzzles to solve. Boulders can be moved to trap nasties and to block arrow shooting walls. There are some monsters which cannot be killed by Sir Merdimek's arrows, though they are vulnerable to other things, and there are wizards who can raise the dead. Sir Merdimek can ride rivers to secret rooms and use teleporters which may lead more hidden treasures.

name: The Bunker
description: Ronin golfer Mike Roman just wants to play golf, but when the evil sorcerer Manlocke miniaturizes him and traps him in the bunker, he must utilize his wits and his golf club in order to escape... ...or he may never be able to play golf again. This game was the winner of the June 2005 MAGS competition.

name: Tile Blocks
description: Place strategically the objects provided to you and Clampy to be able to reach the goal! There's several elements you can use, like boxes, bombs, springs, balloons, and many others. Once you have finished, press the play button and Clampy will start walking! If Clampy can't reach the goal, you can come back to the place mode and the objects will come back to where you place them. You can try as many times you want until you manage to beat the level!

name: Fallout 3 / Oblivion Duo Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: G1deon: Towards God
description: G1Deon: Towards God is an adventure game with elements of quest. The game consists of 2 storylines. At first you have to play for Alan Sparks, the historian from America, who is looking for a fabulous City of Rain. The action takes place in 1979. The second you're playing for the G1Deon, painted character from the diary of Sparks, who travels to places of stories about the City of Rain.

name: The Ramen Prince
description: A Visual Novel game that chronicles the loves and tribulations of a young man who, thanks to a generous benefactor, is starting fresh in a new city and opening a new ramen restaurant.

name: Lewd Maze
description: Lewd Maze (formerly Corrupted Dungeon) is an Isometric dungeon crawler with turnbased pixel fighting part, with some nice in-battle sex. You have two main characters for now, tanned neko and elf girl.

name: The Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Ore No Animism: Hell Chapter
description: A free Touhou-like game made in Danmakufu v0.12m with various animal characters. Gameplay revolves around score-extends by use of a screen-clearing attack charged by collecting point items via grazing / PoC. Much tougher than a typical Touhou-like game, and only has two difficulty levels. However, it features an "Another" Stage, a second kind of Extra Stage where each of the two player characters gets a unique stage, ending with a fight against the other character. Also contains ten boss special attacks, one for each character.

name: Ore no Animism: Heaven Chapter
description: Sequel to Ore no Animism, now using Danmakufu ph3. Features strange gameplay based around purchasing upgrades and bombs in real time. Significantly easier than the first game, and introduces a full set of four difficulties. Also introduces two more player characters, originally bosses from the previous game. Boss special attacks are called "Works" here. Contains ten boss Works for the ten new characters, but these must be unlocked by completing certain tasks.

name: Ore no Animism: Resurrection Chapter
description: Third game in the series. Centers around filling a temperature gauge by staying alive and generally playing well; as it rises, enemies become more dangerous, but more points are rewarded for collecting items and clearing boss special attacks, now called "Tricks". A new type of special attack, the "Ignite Shot", is introduced to allow the player to decrease this gauge. Features four playable characters (including bosses from the previous game). Also contains eight Challenge Tricks for the eight new characters, but these must be unlocked by capturing certain Tricks on all difficulties.

name: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Witch Hunter
description: By purchasing this DLC you unlock Jurgen Haider, a meticulous witch hunter with formidable pistol and sword skills.

name: Farkeep
description: Farkeep is an action adventure roleplaying game heavily inspired by games such as Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past, Undertale and Hyper Light Drifter. Grab your sword and head out on an adventure in the beautiful world of Kerroan! Explore mystical forests, venture into dark temples, make friends, slay foes and solve puzzles! With a great emphasis on the roleplay, your choices affect both gameplay and story.

name: Udongein X
description: Help Reisen Udongein Inaba navigate through 14 action packed stages in this exhilarating 2D Bullet Hell Platformer based on Touhou Project!

name: Law Empire Tycoon
description: Lawyers, Judges, Criminals and Verdicts. Lead an elite law firm and win cases.

name: Atomic War
description: Atomic War is a Dota 2 custom game in the genre of Auto-battler.

name: Wild West Z
description: Wild West Z is the story of the Wild West, enslaved by a supernatural force and its monsters. Take part in gang warfare and battles with monsters on American soil.

name: Alchemistry
description:
Merge elements to discover new ones !

Through challenges, use the given elements to craft transitional elements to reach given objective. Or use sandbox mode to freely craft items together and maybe succeed to create rare items, and to discover everything.

name: Summoner's Mess
description:
Enter a huge manor to fix the mess you've made summoning a beast from the depths.

Look for the three sacred grimoires, hidden in a labyrinth made of rooms, closed doors and unsolved mysteries.

Will you find it before it gets too dark and you'll get consumed by the fears that we can't see?

Enjoy a short time trial experience, memorize the scenario and reach one of the three endings before your torch gets out completely!

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Live
description: Experience the fun and strategy of the Pokémon Trading Card Game in a whole new way with Pokémon Trading Card Game Live! Build your collection of cards in the Battle Pass, and test your skills against other players from around the world in the Ranked Ladder!

name: Referee Simulator
description: A first-person soccer referee simulator will let you see how hard the job of a soccer referee is on the field.

name: Slavania
description: Fantasy metroidvania with a moral choice and hunting the bosses who are not going to patiently wait for you in their lair. Study the monsters. Track'em. Kill'em. Exploration of the vast interconnected fairytale world, an acrobatic combat system and weird locals are what awaits you.

name: Your Way
description: Your Way is a travel simulator with a conundrum element. Here you can walk through the forest and admire nature.

name: Pyro Fighters
description: Pyro Fighters is a scrolling space shooter with platforming physics. Use your flame gun to propel yourself in the air and fight through an alien army with up to four players.

name: Frog's Princess
description: This is a movie-length children's storybook. A young princess strives to save her kingdom, but a frog-prince on a quest to rescue his bodyguard overturns her plans. Rescue Iron Henry and save the kingdom of Kassel in this 2D click-through movie-length children's story. Filled with humor, strong characters, ethical questions, poignant moments, and beautiful evocative music, Frog's Princess is a story you can play again and again. Choose from 10 moods each time the prince and princess speak. Everybody saves the kingdom, some just do it in a more comical way than others.

name: Red Robin
description: There is a place that seems to be invisible, no one can find it, and no signal can be sent from it. "Red Bird", tells of a stranger with endless problems in life and work on a rainy night. Because of an accidental car accident, accidentally found a deep forest where no one knew Houses.

name: Immersys
description: Immersys is a Multiplayer Immersive NFT Metaverse. Players can participating in a vast economy built on the WAX Blockchain. Immersys has is own cryptocurrency named FATE which can be earned through gameplay. The game's equipment, land, and resources are all Non-Fungible Tokens which can be verified on the blockchain.

name: Mega Man 4 Mobile
description:
The Fourth Chapter in the Mega Man Saga
One Year After Mega Man's Battle in Space...
After restoring peace to humanity's perilous mining worlds, Mega Man has enjoyed a brief year of respite.
But now, the world is once again thrown into turmoil as eight cities are overthrown by rampaging robots!
Is this the work of Dr. Wily? Or some mysterious new enemy!?
Mega Man sets forth to take down this threat, equipped with the new Mega Buster!

name: Mega Man 5 Mobile
description: A mobile port of Mega Man 5.

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 2 - Dr. Wily no Nazo
description: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 2 - Dr. Wily no Nazo is an expanded port of Rockman 2 (Famicom), lacking the difficulty selection from the international version (Mega Man 2).

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 3 - Dr. Wily no Saigo!?
description: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 3 - Dr. Wily no Saigo!? is an expanded port of Mega Man 3 (NES).

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 4 - Aratanaru Yabou!!
description: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 4 - Aratanaru Yabou!! is an expanded port of Mega Man 4 (NES),

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 5 - Blues no Wana!?
description: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 5 - Blues no Wana!? is an expanded port of Mega Man 5 (NES).

name: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 6 - Shijou Saidai no Tatakai!!
description: Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 6 - Shijou Saidai no Tatakai!! is an expanded port of Mega Man 6 (NES).

name: Bootleg Fantasy
description: A Final Fantasy X Pokemon JRPG fan game

name: Moratheia
description: Moratheia is a King's Field-inspired game. It will take you to the land of Pelmora, a torn land where savage beasts await those who would dare explore its depths, where allies are few and trickery and temptation attempt to knock you off balance... A story so daring it will take you to some of the strangest and eeriest places imaginable, testing your resolve and commitment at every turn.

name: The Burgomaster
description: A dark plague is consuming the town. One doctor is left to learn the truth, and try to find a cure.

name: The Cabin
description:
Why can't you remember a time before the snow started falling?

The Cabin is a short, first person, slow-burn psychological thriller set in a cabin. Why is this cabin here? Better yet, why are you here?

The Cabin is proof-of-concept game created in 15 days for the November 2020 AGS monthly adventure game challenge.

name: The Cadaver Synod
description: The year is 897. Pope Stephen the sixth or seventh, is holding a trial against his predecessor Formosus, and you have been chosen as Formosus defender. The thing is, you hardly know a thing about law. That's probably why Stephen chose you. This game was made for MAGS in June 2016 with the theme "Neglected Historical Eras".

name: The Dark Convergence
description:
The Dark Convergence is a very rare horror adventure game from the early '90s.

The plot is simple: one night the player and some friends have a car crash on a near-deserted road. The player is sent out to search for some help and stumbles on an abandoned house. Inside it bloody bodies are found, and unknown menaces from other worlds and other dimensions try to kill the player. Will you survive the night and save the day?

The game is programmed in QBasic (there is even the .bas file inside the game's folder) and the engine is similar to the one used in the Hugo's House of Horror series. The player controls the character with arrow keys and types the desired action using the parser.

The game focuses on a morbid atmosphere and on violence with many nasty and gory situations in it. The plot and atmosphere for some ideas are reminiscent of Dark Seed.

name: The Dark Convergence II
description:
This is the sequel to The Dark Convergence and takes place some time after the end of the original game.

The player has survived the horrible night, but his mind is deeply scarred by the horrors he had to face. In fact, the player lives as a bum, wandering aimlessly on the streets, not capable of retrieving his own lost sanity. A new horrid menace may be lurking underneath the apparent calm and may be linked to the psychiatrist who is searching for the player...

This game uses the same engine as the original game with similar gameplay and atmospheres.

name: The Darkest Night
description:
The Darkest Night is a graphical adventure game with a horror theme, set in the land of 'Tilorm'. The protagonist is a young anthropomorphic fox called 'Rolan', who is lost in a forest after an evening of heavy drinking with his friends, celebrating Hallows Eve.
While sleeping it off in the woods, he is awakened by a tattered and bloody yelling man, who comes running up to you, collapsing but managing to tell you of an evil cult trying to release the Demon Yaxagiraw tonight, a netherworld being who was imprisoned in an old Abbey hundreds of years ago, but who could be released again during Hallows night, when the souls of the damned are close to our dimension.
Having delivered his warning, the man dies and leaves you to prevent the cultists from achieving their goal.

name: The Disgraced Prince
description: This is the story of a prince who, due to a tiny attempt to murder his own sister and usurp the throne, has been forced into exile in a remote mountain monastery. Surprising to none, something sinister dwells among this isolated group of men dressed in dark hooded cloaks. Seriously, has anyone seen a story about a rural community that DIDN'T hide something fishy?

name: The Execution of Anne Boleyn
description: Created for MAGS September 2017, for the theme "Past and Future Collide". When villains from the future alter the past, a time traveler must try to set history back on track with the help of an imprisoned queen.

name: The Frame on the Wall
description: This project was made in collaboration with Blondbraid for Mags october 2017. An old woman ends up in a small cabin in the woods a stormy night, but is everything alright with the strange old painting hung on the wall?

name: The Kingdom of Syree
description:
The Kingdom of Syree is a RPG based on the novels by Lord Steven and heavily inspired by the earlier Ultima games.

After many years of peace evil is threatening the kingdom of Syree: an evil wizard wishes to conquer the kingdom. None of the kingdom's great heroes have returned from their search for the wizard, and now it is your time to search for him and kill him.

The screen is divided into three parts. To the upper left is the game area where all the action takes place. To the upper right is the status area where you can see your equipment, health and wealth, and at the bottom of the screen is the message window where conversations and such will show up. The game features lots of exploring and monster killing.

name: The Lost Tribe
description:
In The Lost Tribe you get to go back in time and lead a prehistoric tribe to a new homeland. When the volcano that your tribe has always called "home" explodes and molten lava engulfs your village at its base, you have little choice but to assume command of your frightened tribe and seek out a different place to live. This means providing for your tribe's food, shelter, safety, and general happiness all along the way.

Six different scenarios provide a variety of challenges for players of various skill levels. The game's educational side is present in teaching the player about prehistoric cultures, artifacts, and mythology.

name: The Man From Fugue State
description: A stranger arrives in the sleepy town of Tumbleweed with no memory of his identity only to find the residents suffering at the hands of feared outlaw El Marcado, 'the marked one'. Soon he finds himself caught up in a plot to defeat the outlaw once and for all. But who is this stranger and why is the mysterious El Marcado so interested in Tumbleweed?

name: Goal Kick
description: A ball-and-paddle game from Sega.

name: Arn's Winter Quest
description: In the words of its creator, “Arn’s Winter Quest has been a labor of love for me for two months, and rivals those hacks such as Hat Quest and EarthBound 2.5: Electric Boogaloo Joint Jive. It has a lot of fun inside jokes, an incoherent story, and all new battle graphics. This hack is basically linear Dragon Warrior with a bunch of humor thrown in, so if you like fighting and you like funny and you like very hard viewtiful fun time hacks, then don’t play this hack because it’ll satisfy your cravings and your head will probably explode.”

name: Bullet Mark
description: A light gun game by Sega released in 1975. The unweildy cabinet proved unpopular with distributors, leading to the development of a scaled-down version called Tracer in 1976. This game was the first Sega game to be produced in America.

name: Tracer
description: Sega Tracer released in 1976 as a compact version of its predecessor Bullet Mark. These early light gun games provided a bridge between electro-mechanical arcade and early video games.

name: Rock'n Bark
description: Rock'n Bark, sometimes erroneously labeled as "Rock'n Park", is a 1976 discrete logic game by Sega with twin Tommy Guns. It is similar to Sega's earlier 1975 game Bullet Mark - complete with the "Bullet Mark" branding on the cabinet, suggesting it may have earlier been a cabinet variant or sequel.

name: Jellyfish: The Healing Friend
description: Jellyfish: The Healing Friend lets the player follow the life and times of a deep depths jellyfish who moves by way of water propulsion. Learn about the life cycle of your nebulous charge in this simulation where you attempt to raise a wild sea creature. Moderate water temperature, a regular feeding schedule and other factors will all contribute to your success or failure.

name: Wildwood
description: Wildwood is a light gun/shooting game released by Sega in 1978. Like most early Sega arcade games it uses discrete logic rather than a microprocessor to produce its gameplay.

name: Galaxy War
description: Galaxy War is a discrete logic arcade game released by Sega in 1978. It is a shooting game which is very similar to Bullet Mark—four types of targets, such as spacecraft and disks, are aimed at by one or two players. There is a bullet indicator and you can fire the trigger while squeezing the trigger.

name: Yuoni: Sunset Edition
description: Yuoni is a first-person narrative horror game that whisks you away to a sunset-stained world to play a deadly game of hide and seek. As grade-schooler Ai, navigate authentic Japanese environments and utilise every hiding space you can find to survive the horrors ahead. And if they find you… run.

name: Space Invaders Forever: Special Edition
description:
Back again - arcade legend and icon of gaming history! Lighting the fuse for a gaming revolution. Space Invaders is surely one of the most famous video games of all time and was the launching pad for the video gaming revolution. The game mechanics and its design make it a game that encompasses all the very best.

The following games are part of the Space Invader Forever Collection: Special Edition:
- Space Invaders Extreme game
- Space Invaders Gigamax 4 SE game
- Arkanoid vs. Space Invaders game
- Rubber Keychain
- A3 Poster
- Invader Card
- 4 Outdoor Stickers
- Invader Pin
- Note Pad
- Post Card Set
- Mini Art Plate

name: Dusk Diver 2
description: Dragon Vein is a type of special energy that spans throughout all dimensions. Kunlun is the homeland of the higher dimensional beings who have developed advanced Dragon Vein technologies. The story begins with a girl named Yang Yumo and her classmate Liu Yusha when they accidentally trespassed Youshanding and started an adventure.

name: Tail Gunner
description: Tail Gunner is vector arcade game created by Vectorbeam in 1979. As enemy space craft attack the player, they must aim a set of cross-hairs and shoot the enemies before they move past the player's laser cannons or use shield to bounce them back into play.

name: Dead by Daylight: 5th Anniversary Edition
description:
Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

The Dead by Daylight: 5th Anniversary Edition includes:

- The Last Breath Chapter
- A Lullaby for the Dark Chapter
- Of Flesh and Mud Chapter
- Spark of Madness Chapter

Additional Contents
- Biohazard Chapter
- Shattered Bloodline Chapter
- Curtain Call Chapter

name: I Love Finding Cats
description: I Love Finding Cats is a classic Hidden Object game. Explore a variety of different hidden object scenes, lots of minigame puzzles and most importantly collect all the adorable cats!

name: The Revenant Protocol
description: The Revenant Protocol is a third person shooter with hack'n slash features where you will combine your deadly blade and vicious firepower to become the apex hunter in a world mutated by an experimental technology.

name: TitTok
description: TitTok - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws!

name: Cubyrinth
description: Cubyrinth is a 3D puzzle game. Will you be able to navigate and find the correct solution in the labyrinth located on the 6 sides of the cube? This game will provide you with an infinite number of auto-generated 3D labyrinths!

name: The Elm Game
description: A board game for two players that is easy to learn yet hard to master, played on a stylized tree stump. The computer can substitute for a second player at any time.

name: Mud River
description: Mud River is a horizontal 2D Shoot‘em Up game. The Rio Doce (Sweet River) was a paradise for mankind and animals, but now it has become a territory destroyed by the unscrupulous activities of Dr. Wellin. This is Pacal's first destination, ascending the Rio Doce preventing its complete destruction.

name: The Long Journey to Farewell
description: An SNES style action\puzzle RPG. Help two friends caught as a queen tries to save her brother but curses him instead. Dramatic story, loveable characters, strategic action battles, amusing puzzles and a fantasy\sci-fi world to explore.

name: Gpi
description: Jump and jump to reach the goal.Play with one button.There are 5 stages and all mixed stages.Jump with timing in the direction that changes every 1 second.No thorns and no time limit, but it will be difficult to reach the goal.

name: Sorcerer Knights
description: Fight terrible enemies through a varied fantasy world.

name: ToruTaru
description: Delve into the infinitely AI-generated, ghastly haunted mansion of TORUTARU. Use talismans, maps, your wits, and the friends you make along the way to fight off the angered spirits and survive. Every playthrough is a unique experience.

name: Sword of Hypotenuse
description: Cut, squash, and headbutt other tofu ninja in this adventure searching for the truth of the Pythagoreans' Theorem! Explore various world permutations and collect rare Alogon history as you break and link different worlds to create the true Number Line.

name: One Fateful Night
description: One Fateful Night is a horror game where the player attempts to survive the night inside a scientific research base that has appeared mysteriously. The player must explore and use things they find to survive and escape.

name: Kingdom of Heroes
description: An RPG game that grows by defeating monsters to level up and making a variety of items.

name: Nuremberg: VRdict of Nations
description: A VR investigation of the crimes against humanity committed by the Nazi leaders.

name: Sokobear: Winter
description: Sokobear is the spa's maintenance bear, his job is to turn on the heating and massage system of all the natural pools in this winter spa.

name: Movers in the Warehouse
description: Movers in the Warehouse is a puzzle game about workers in a warehouse with strategy and arcade elements, made in a 2D drawn style.

name: Ball.io
description: Shoot and survive, Play with other people online.

name: Survival Zone
description: Rich levels, in-depth gameplay, and diverse turrets. In the game, you will use your turret to defend against a variety of enemies.

name: You are a slave!
description: You are a slave! is a first-person adventure. In this game you are taken into slavery. For fear of death, you decide to escape from the castle with the help of your new friend. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to escape from the castle.

name: Endure
description: Endure is psychological horror experience exploring the human mind and the effects psychedelics can have on a damaged one.

name: Rockman Dash / Rockman Dash 2 Value Pack
description: Rockman Dash / Rockman Dash 2 Value Pack is a compilation of Mega Man Legends and Mega Man Legends 2 released for PlayStation Portable in Japan in January 2009. The games are the same as their separate PSP versions.

name: Zakesta
description: Zakesta is a Doujin STG similar in style to Caravan STGs of the early 90s. It notably includes the use of music that utilizes vocaloid software to provide lyrics as background music.

name: Air Combat III
description: Sin descripción

name: Space War
description: Space War is the first game released by Vectorbeam after its founders left Cinematronics. It is essentially a very close version of Cinematronic's Space Wars, which had in turn been brought to Cinematronics by Vectorbeam founder Larry Rosenthal as a prototype inspired by the 1962 PDP-1 game Spacewar.

name: Teiji Taisha Online
description: Japanese people work hard, and they do many jobs. But, because of their jobs, they sometimes want to escape from their offices. In this game, we can experience running away from there. Please escape from your office and its boss...

name: Hack
description: Hack is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario World, and the first game in the Hack series by Golden Yoshi.

name: Hack 2
description: Hack 2 is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario World, and the second game in the Hack series by Golden Yoshi.

name: Hack 4
description: Hack 4 is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario World, and the fourth game in the Hack series by Golden Yoshi.

name: Hack 5
description: Hack 5 is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario World, and the fifth game in the Hack series by Golden Yoshi.

name: Five Nights at F***boy's 3: Final Mix
description:
Springtrap embarks on the most thrilling night of debauchery yet...

Five Nights at F***boy’s 3 is a FNaF fangame developed by Sable Lynn and Joshua Shaw. It is the climactic sequel to Five Nights at F***boy's and Five Nights at F***boy's 2.
Featuring multiple scenarios, a complex and intuitive battle system, a plethora of enemies, and loads of secrets!

name: Idle Angels
description: Fantastic Idle Strategy RPG game! Collect and upgrade your angels, battle with your friends!

name: Singularity
description: A Virtual Reality Art piece, exploring the Law of accelerating returns and the development of A.I.

name: Quizee
description: Quizee is a Trivia based party game that can be played locally with friends, or online with a Twitch community! If you're a streamer on Twitch, then get your community involved! Link the game with your Twitch chat, and your community can type their answers to the questions to compete to see who is the smartest in your community! If you want to play with your friends, hook up gamepads and play locally!

name: Yellow Brick Road
description: Yellow Brick Road is a survival shooter where you take the role as a special force soldier who are thrown into an enemy forest without his teammates. It's up to you and you alone to find a way out by fighting everyone that gets in your way.

name: Grayland
description: A small, simple, and patient puzzle platformer where you must find your color in a world without it. Stick to walls and navigate the environment while restoring color to the world around you, and find yourself in the process.

name: Haymaker
description: Haymaker is an 80s boxing game that takes place in the blue-collar rustbelt town of Kint. You play as Jackie Elliot, a 21-year-old who's impressionable life is swaying between corruption and commitment; the path to becoming a great boxer, or the path of crime. Your choice, your story.

name: Endless Blue
description: Endless Blue is a classic survival horror adventure set in a mysterious underwater research facility.

name: Minigolf
description: A top-down minigolf game including different modes and items. Play with up to seven friends! Choose between a classic, dynamic or extreme dynamic game. Challange yourself in the build, survival and last-ball-standing mode. Use items to prevent your friends from winning.

name: Subway Simulator: Moscow Train
description: 81-765 Moscow Train. By popular demand, we are adding a train without which it is impossible to imagine the Moscow subway now. The maximum speed of the Moscow train is noticeably faster than other trains' in the game.

name: Throne of Fate: Tiger Roar
description:
Throne of Fate: Tiger Roar includes:
- Sword FINN damage 20-20
- Special hairstyle
- Special body
- FINN costume (Mask, body)

name: Throne of Fate: Hell Demon
description:
Throne of Fate: Hell Demon includes:
- Sword Sausage in the dough damage 0-99
- Special hairstyle
- Special body
- Sandwich suit (Mask, body)

name: Super Mega Baseball 2: El Viejo Stadium
description: Take a step back in time with the classical grandstand design and vibrant cityscape of historic El Viejo Stadium. This DLC gets you El Viejo Stadium, an additional ballpark for Super Mega Baseball 2.

name: Super Mega Baseball 2: Red Rock Park
description: Play in a brand new ballpark surrounded by cacti, sandstone peaks, and endless blistering desert. This DLC gets you Red Rock Park, an additional stadium for Super Mega Baseball 2.

name: A-Train 9 V4.0: Japan Rail Simulator - Mega Japan Train Pack
description: More Than 40 New Trains!The world of A-Train moves up a step with the introduction of our first free DLC pack. Adding more than 40 new trains, you can now create worlds more diverse than ever. Each train has its own strengths and weaknesses.

name: Super Huey 1 & 2 Airdrop
description: In 1985, Cosmi stunned the gaming world with the first helicopter flight simulator for the Commodore 64, then followed it up with an amazing sequel. Now, the original groundbreaking series returns together in one package! Pilot an experimental helicopter in these groundbreaking 8-bit sims.

name: Sixtieth Kilometer: Eightieth Kilometer
description: The pink for disappeared about a year ago. The world had changed forever. We no longer lived – we survived.What happened to the world and the characters you love - find out after the end of the Sixtieth Kilometer.

name: Realities: Death Valley
description: Based on the book America Deserta, this experience sends you on a personal road trip through the empty vastness of one of Americas most spectacular deserts: Death Valley. While freely exploring the photorealistic scans of the diverse and sometimes bizarre landscapes you can also decide to dig deeper, simultaneously exploring the thoughts of self declared desert freak Reyner Banham & his complex relation with the American desert by finding the cassettes left behind in each of the six scenes.

name: Age of Empires II: HD Edition - The African Kingdoms
description: Welcome to Age of Empires II: HD Edition - The African Kingdoms; the second new official expansion for the Age of Empires II universe in over 16 years. Challenge friends with four additional civilizations, new units, ships and technologies.

name: Oblivious Garden: Carmina Burana - Oblivious Garden: White Day
description: Oblivious Garden: White Day is an additional chapter which tells the story between Irell and the noble princess, Leira.

name: Island Saver: Fantasy Island
description: Suit up, Bionaut and get ready for an awesome new adventure! The Floating Islands and it’s amazing mythical creatures need you.

name: Toukiden: Kiwami - Mission Collection 1-3
description: Toukiden: Kiwami - Mission Collection 1, 2 and 3 are included in this bundle. The materials obtained upon clearing the missions can be used to create new armor.

name: Toukiden: Kiwami - Mission Collection 4-7
description: Toukiden: Kiwami - Mission Collection 4, 5, 6 and 7 are included in this bundle. The materials obtained upon clearing the missions can be used to create new weapons and armor.

name: Toukiden: Kiwami - Mission Collection 8-11
description: Toukiden: Kiwami - Mission Collection 8, 9, 10 and 11 are included in this bundle. The materials obtained upon clearing the missions can be used to create new weapons and armor.

name: Death Crown: Era of Human
description: Learn the King’s story, clear the primitive lands of evil and unite humanity in a new campaign of the Death Crown.

name: Gunscape: Seismic
description: The sci-fi horror-themed Seismic Pack introduces a new level of tension to Gunscape, adding ghoulish enemies and a suite of level-building blocks to the game’s already expansive set.

name: Elios VR
description: In a virtual reality space with a fantasy background, three basic classes (warrior, wizard, archer) raid giant boss monsters. MMORPG VR game content that allows you to perform special role missions with a special class called Ghost (Ghost) if you fall into spirit escape during battle with a boss.

name: Universal Combat CE: The Lyrius Conflict
description: The ultimate space capital ship combat sim is getting a visual makeover and lots of tech upgrades.

name: B-17 Squadron
description: Take control of a B-17 in a realistic bomber simulator. Destroy key targets by dropping tons of bombs on them. Command each member of the crew and feel their stress and tension. Take part in the historical campaign across occupied Europe.

name: Find Your Way: Episode 1
description: We continue on our way to the city of Asten, perhaps the only surviving city all along our way.

name: Mineirinho Director's Cut: Mineirinho Hoversurf DC
description: A new adventure of Miner, you will surf a lot and have a lot of radical adrenaline, a casual third person game with a lot of emotion.

name: Stellar Warrior: Master Levels
description: Sellar Warrior is a classic upscrolling spaceshooter for one or two players in a bullet-hell gameplay style! rank up to get to the best score on the Steam leaderboards and unlock all those achievements!

name: Pandemic: The Board Game - On the Brink: Roles & Events
description: Humanity is on the brink of extinction. To fight the pandemic and eradicate the diseases spreading around the globe, you’ll have to assemble the best team of specialists.

name: Pandemic: The Board Game - On the Brink: Mutation
description: You thought you saved humanity already? "On the Brink: Mutation" DLC brings a fifth, special, highly dangerous and purple, disease to eradicate.

name: Slime Pandemic TD
description: Defend the galaxy against a slimey pandemic in this classic Tower Defence game. Choose what towers you want to

name: Hibiscus Red: Part 2
description: In the second part of the series, Hibiscus explores the other world in search of his father. As the plot thickens, Hibiscus faces old enemies and makes new friends, that will help him on his way.

name: Galagan's Island: Reprymian Rising - Metagalactic Monstrosities
description: Play as the 5 bosses from Galagan's Island: Reprymian Rising!

name: Age of Conan: Unchained - Hyborian Conqueror Collection
description:
Discover the very ends of the Hyborian frontier with the Hyborian Conqueror Collection! This collection features all of the additional content found in Age of Conan: Unchained in a single package!

The collection includes:
- Rise of the Godslayer
- Savage Coast of Turan
- Secrets of Dragon’s Spine
- Shadow of Vanaheim
- Exclusive “Spiked Cloak of Vapours” vanity item!

name: Solar Sails
description: Solar Sails is a satirical space pirates adventure game. Take control of a 17th-century pirate ship, upgrade it with powerful alien technologies, and sail onwards to plunder a galaxy full of treasures and mysteries.

name: Dragon Fang Z: The Rose & Dungeon of Time - Extra Dungeon: The Inferno Hollow
description: The dangerous "One Room" experiences are waiting for your visit!

name: Dragon Fang Z: The Rose & Dungeon of Time - Extra Dungeon: The Cave of Fangs
description: Take advantage of Fangs' powers to clear the dungeon!

name: Chinbu's Adventure: Ice World
description: Continue Chinbu's Adventure in a brand new world covered with ice and snow!

name: Premier Manager 04/05
description: You’ll experience all the emotions of football management in Premier Manager 2004-2005. Find out if you’ve got what it takes…

name: Timore 5: The Flood
description: Timore 5: The Flood is an addition to Timore 5, where you explore the basement of the Frank's house and discover about the creation named PAINbot001.

name: Icey: Ucey's Awakening
description: This experiment was coming to a close, but it seems that we underestimated the uncontrollable factors of our plan. We must set right what is wrong. We must control what is unexpected. Icey's absence has allowed Ucey to reach the peak of her lawlessness.

name: Hover Ship
description: Hover Ship is an arcade game in which you have to control a floating ship on an obstacle course, collect coins and set new records.

name: Sakura Knight 3
description: Estelle's adventures in the land of Lemuria come to a head in this yuri fantasy visual novel. Estelle faces a fierce challenge in the form of the wicked dragonkin Saga, all while deciding which member of her party she wants to pledge her to heart to. It's hard to fight evil and fall in love!

name: Eight-Minute Empire: Mountains
description: Scouts inform that new lands are full of mountains. Control most important valleys and hills gives you best position in the final battle. Build mountain city to increase your influence. Natives settlers and builders might help you, so collect goods and save money to pay them.

name: Eight-Minute Empire: Archipelago of Azra Map
description: The recently discovered Islands of Azra are full of rare animal species and new opportunity for factions looking to expand their influence on the seas. Change of the rules for this map: For a coin you can upgrade the basic troop movement to water movement.

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Survival of the Nerdiest
description: Survival of the Nerdiest is the first premium DLC for Doom & Destiny Worlds. It features the "Survival" modifier, which will challenge you with new game-play mechanics like hunger, thirst, sleep and thermal comfort.

name: Shadow: Treachery Cannot Be Tolerated - Episode 2: Retaliation
description: After Shadow takes her revenge she gets to know that one of her men is arrested and he is about to rat her out. She determines to stop him and also promises her boyfriend that it will be her last crime after this she will leave behind her life of crimes.

name: Donkey Kong
description: This is the ColecoVision port of Donkey Kong. The main differences with the original arcade game are the absence of 50m, cutscenes and enemy placement.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Coleco Tabletop port of Donkey Kong has many differences from the original, the main ones being the exclusion of both 50m and 75m.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Donkey Kong port for Intellivision was developed by Coleco, and lacks 50m and 75m. It is also very visually different from the original arcade game.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Coleco Adam port of Donkey Kong was developed by Coleco and released in 1984.

name: To End All Wars: Breaking the Deadlock
description: To End All Wars: Breaking the Deadlock is the first expansion to the most detailed World War One wargame ever created. Adding 5 completely new scenarios, this expansion aims to vastly increase the content in-game, giving players the option to focus on specific campaigns.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Commodore 64 port of Donkey Kong is very much faithful to the original arcade port, with some small differences. This port was developed by Atari.

name: Runner
description: Runner is an arcade-inspired VR driving action game. Pursued by the forces of the Caldara corporation, Players must race through 7 sectors while fighting off relentless waves of autonomous corporate combat drones in this heavily stylized retro-futuristic anime-inspired VR arcade shooter.

name: Supreme Ruler Ultimate: Trump Rising
description: New Supreme Ruler Ultimate Sandbox beginning on Inauguration Day, January 20, 2017. Take control as President Trump to Make America Great Again! Or will you further your ambition as another national leader looking to capitalize on an isolationist and dysfunctional world!

name: Regions of Ruin: Sieges
description:
Do you want more Regions of Ruin? Did you feel you wanted to add Siege mechanics to the game? New characters, companions, and loot? Then this is your DLC!

Introducing the Regions of Ruin Sieges DLC which includes :
- 7 New siege event areas
- 2 New mercenary types for hire
- New building (Training Ground)
- Loads'o'loot
- Greatly upgrade companions
- Repeatedly challenge yourself with sieges to earn unending loot and rewards
- Hire new companions to help in the fray and from afar

name: Be a Maid in the Demon World: The Secret Cafe of the Demon Angel Hero
description: The protagonist who Reincarnated to the Demon World became a black mascot, in order to restore his original appearance. Use the knowledge of the "different world" to transform the little devil's tavern into a maid cafe, and aim for the first maid cafe in the demon world!

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Donkey Kong port for Atari 7800 was developed by Atari Corporation.

name: Inferno
description: After discovering & rescuing an unconscious elite warrior from a dangerous jungle, a soldier, a scientist and a nurse decide to team up and escape from the ravaged army base where they'd been struggling for days. Can they find help in the jungle? Who will survive and make it?

name: Soda Crisis
description: Soda Crisis is a fast-paced side-scrolling shooter game. You play a mysterious character of unknown origin, equipped with advanced high-tech gears and fierce combating skills - definitely the chosen one for this rescue mission!

name: Donkey Kong
description: The second official port of Donkey Kong for the Commodore 64 was developed by Ocean Software. It is more faithful to the original game.

name: Lingering
description: An LGBTQ+ Mystery Visual Novel with comic panel style aesthetics and pixel styled backgrounds. Join The Heart Breachers operatives as they navigate the world of desire, treachery, and emotional turmoil while learning to understand lofty concepts such as friendship, hope, and belief in oneself.

name: Superfly
description: Superfly is a virtual reality action game where you play as the superhero of your dreams. Mix and match eight unique movement modes to fly through a massive open-world city full of challenges for your movement and combat skills.

name: Eberouge Special: Koi to Mahou no Gakuen Seikatsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Eberouge 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Я буду космонавтом
description: Sin descripción

name: alt:V
description: alt:V is a free alternative multiplayer client for GTA:V. It provides perfect synchronization on custom dedicated servers. Play with your friends and make your own game modes with JS, C# and much more.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 2 - Season 8
description: Chapter 2: Season 8, is the eighteenth season in Fortnite: Battle Royale that started on September 13th, 2021 and finished on December 4th, 2021. It's themed around the Cubes that fell on the island after the Alien Mothership was destroyed and is title Cubed.

name: Elle
description: Elle is a point-and-click adventure in Japanese style (no puzzles). The interaction with the environment is performed by moving the mouse cursor around; when it is possible to interact with an object, the cursor turns into a command icon (look, talk, push, take, etc., depending on the situation). The navigation is performed by selecting locations from a menu. The player advances by examining objects, talking to people, and unlocking new locations.

name: Tint n Ink
description:
Tint n Ink is a first person shooter videogame about Paintball, fight & hit your rivals and get fun everytime.

Find strategies, use the best techniques and create amazing tactics to destroy your opponents.

name: Battle Craze!!
description: Battle Craze follows the events of the Battle Craze Tournament Series, a martial arts competition that takes place every five years, with the best of the world willing to compete. Although, something else draws those to this tournament. A hidden threat? The promise of wealth? Scores to be settled? For Ajit Sinha, he's here to save the world from a foreseen destruction only known to him, and nothing will stop him.

name: All the Way Down
description: A Lovecraftian adventure set in rural Yorkshire, England.

name: Him
description: A horror game made for #AdvJam2016 You play an old man visiting an old haunted house. What mysteries will you uncover?

name: Hope
description: Our hero awakens in a strange world, tethered to strange machines, unsure of how he got there and if he wants to go back...

name: The Ever-Beginning Tale
description: You find yourself in a strange new world and now you must find your way back home!

name: Slash Quest!
description: Forget your power fantasy. Slash Quest’s simple yet unfamiliar controls will put you in the shoes of an unlikely knight with a big heart, an even bigger weapon, and absolutely zero skills. But worry not! Just like Shep and Swordie’s friendship, before you know it everything will feel right and everyone will be counting on you to save the Queendom.

name: The McCarthy Chronicles: Episode 1
description:
A film-noir inspired, supernatural detective story.

Rick McCarthy is a private detective marred by a secretive and destructive past.

He is pulled into a world of blood sacrifice and invocation.

Can he hide his past, solve the crime and get the girl?

name: Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life
description: An indie Metroidvania/JRPG that is heavily story-based about a goo creature who hates his job and his lazy cousin

name: World Series Baseball
description:
Sega Sports' World Series Baseball, or simply World Series Baseball, is a sports game developed by BlueSky Software and published by Sega for the Genesis/Mega Drive. It is the first game in the series and was originally released in 1994. A Sega CD version was planned, but later cancelled.

The game was a major advancement in Sega baseball games in that it included licensed MLB players and teams (the first baseball video game to have both such licenses [previous baseball video games only had one license]; they are based on the rosters for the 1994 MLB season), and relatively accurate gameplay.

San Diego Padres broadcaster Jerry Coleman provides the play-by-play for the game.

name: Bris de Glace
description:
The goal of the game is simple : Two buildings are under construction on either side of a crane. Each of the two players must put down the windows of his building or destroy those of his neighbor with a big hammer blow.

When there is only one human player, the computer runs a vandal who smashes the windows with stones.

name: Dustwind: The Last Resort
description: Roam a post-apocalyptic world as a nameless heroine and fight for your survival in the desolate Wastelands! Experience the moving single-player campaign in the real-time tactical action game Dustwind - The Last Resort. Find weapons, develop your character, defend yourself against looters and become the Wastelands' new leader!

name: QField
description: Fast paced multiplayer FPS / TPS arena soccer-shooter offering tight and frenetic matches in beautiful arena environments.

name: CityBeat: The Sorority Shuffle
description: Adult Interactive Fiction. Tasked by the chief editor of the Scandals Section, you must put your wits and cunning to work to break a story about sex, secrets, and corruption.

name: Perseverance: Part 2
description: Perseverance is a horror/crime thriller visual novel. Play as Karen, a calculated assassin, and witness the gripping story of secrets, passion, and violence.

name: Closer: Anagnorisis
description: Closer: Anagnorisis is a game with distinctive art and gameplay. It contains a lot of creative designs. Here you will feel the spiritual experience.

name: Spellario
description: Spellario - it's a new fantasy RPG clicker. Learn new spells, increase your DPS, fight with danger mobs on 8 different locations. Get the loot and gold, buy equipment in the shop or craft it yourself.

name: Phantom Sense VR
description: You will be able to feel your VR avatar hugging, kissing, or even having sex, just as if it were happening in real life.

name: Glass
description: Bring together desires that are scattered into bits and pieces. And discover the secrets of the 'World of Glass'.

name: Antadin DX
description: A dark jrpg with tough choices that change the story. You play as the last of the antadins, the protector of the queen of your colony. You have to traverse bleak, corrupted caverns, inhabitated by a myriad of different insects. Trying to protect your ward.

name: Sapphire Safari
description: Monster girls come in many diverse forms and sizes, can you capture them on camera? Sapphire Safari is an on-rails photography shooter. Snap photos of Monster Girls in their natural habitat, use tools to lure them into more erotic poses, and become intimate with them if you are brave enough...

name: Ally Gory: The Great Mushroom Hunt
description: "Ally Gory: The Great Mushroom Hunt" by Fortuitous Development, LLC. is a top-down action-adventure game where you collect objects, solve puzzles, and fight monsters across over 25 story-driven levels.

name: Stellaren II
description: A space sci-fi visual novel in post-apocalyptic worldCombines a unique visual novel experience with multiple mini-games!Travel across multiple locations across space and meet a diverse set of interesting characters.

name: Ninja Hanrei
description: Ninja Hanrei is a 2D run and gun Platformer game inspired on Ancient Japan but with Super Powers.

name: Fantasy Heroes 2
description: Follow the adventures of mentalist Valentin and princess knight Anais, caught up in a race against time to stop a deadly virus. Who's behind the disease? Can your heroes find a cure and save the world? Play Fantasy Heroes 2 and find out!

name: Lithoi: Trials of Memory
description: Take a peek on the land of Aegea and its mystical Gem Stones called Lithoi. Across multiple levels in 3 different challenges, test your memory by matching Lithoi Gems. Gather their essence to your advantage, and power your spells. A classic match-two Memory Game in an artful mystical world.

name: Retro Run
description: Retro run will put you in the sneakers of the runner Neon. You platform and swing your way over to get the precious Runner energy drink!

name: Onmyoji in the Otherworld: Sayaka's Story
description: Turn-based combat & erotic sex! Along with her childhood friend Haru and a talking furball (rabbit?) god, Sayaka lives a peaceful life, but when an earthquake strikes, aggressive spirits suddenly appear and her world is torn apart.

name: Blood and Zombies
description: Blood and Zombies is a thrilling first-person shooter with horror elements and lots of zombies. You need to withstand as many waves of zombies as possible, by building up defenses and heavy weapons, using a large amount of guns.

name: Merge Chess
description: A brand new approach to Chess!

name: Meow'n'Dash
description: Meow 'n' Dash is a tiny, highly-addictive and fast paced arcade game. Play as one of the adorable kittens and clear stages by turning all the yarn balls to the same color by pushing them against each other.

name: Cherry Blossom Fleet
description: cherry blossom fleet is a 2D shooting game set in the Japanese Navy of World War II.

name: Heroes of Normandie: US Rangers
description: Heroes of Normandie: US Rangers brings reinforcements to the American player allowing them to continue the advance into occupied Europe: the stubborn US Rangers!

name: Kaya Joshi: Magical Detective
description: Kaya Joshi: Magical Detective is a family friendly Hidden Object Adventure. The game blends Hidden Object game play with Adventure gameplay.

name: Combat Casino
description: Do you have what it takes to survive the Combat Casino?

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Atari 8-bit computer port of Donkey Kong was developed by Atari, Inc.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Commodore VIC-20 port of Donkey Kong was developed by Atari, Inc., under the Atarisoft label.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Texas Instruments TI-99/4A of Donkey Kong was developed by Atari, Inc., under the Atarisoft label.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The MS-DOS port of Donkey Kong was developed by Atari, Inc., under the Atarisoft label. It was marketed for the IBM-PC computers.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Apple II port of Donkey Kong was developed by Atari, Inc., under the Atarisoft label. It was released as a floppy disk.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The Amstrad CPC port of Donkey Kong was developed by Ocean Software.

name: Donkey Kong
description: The MSX port of Donkey Kong was developed by Ocean Software.

name: Donkey Kong

name: EA Sports College Football 25
description: In EA Sports College Football 25 experience explosive gameplay variety across 134 FBS schools and immerse yourself in the iconic atmospheres of college football as you chase college greatness.

name: Charlie: The Legend
description: Equip yourself with the best weapons and get ready to face your worst fears... Charlie: The Legend aspires to become a must have for all those who enjoy multiplayer horror games. Charlie is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror video game in which 4 Survivors must face a diabolical doll possessed by a demon. It's up to you! Play as Charlie and defeat the other players or take on Charlie as a survivor.
